Lusengu lumue ke bantu binunu ne binunu ba bena Efrayime, lukuabu ke bantu nkama ne nkama ba bena Menashe
Matayo Bukelenge bua mu diulu budi bu muena budimi, wakaya dinda bua kukeba bena mudimu bua kumudimina budimi buandi bua mamuma a nvinyo
Meme nengikale nebe
Tshisamba tshia Yuda:
Lufu, kutamba kuebe kudi hanyi
Gideona, muana wa Yoasha, wakalua mufume ku nvita ku mukuna wa Helese
Kuangataye matempu onsu a mu Ejipitu, kadi nangananga matempu mimpe nkama isambombu
Bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu webe bakafua bualu buanyi
Hakimanabi talalâ, biakabuikila mahuahua abi
Nunku Yelemiya wakashala mu tshiendelu tshia balami ba nsubu wa lukanu
Yakobe umona Rakele, muana wa mansebende Labane, ufika ne bimuna, kumushaye dibue divua dibuikila ku tshiina tshia mayi, kunuisha bimuna mayi
Ke muvua Yakobe mutungunuke ne madilu a muanende Yozefe nanku
Binabanda mu diulu, wewe udiku
Mupika munyeme Pikala mupika munyeme mfumuende, musokome mu ditunga dienu, kanumupingaji kua mfumuende to
Yuda wakamuambila ne, Mulume au wakabambila bikole ne, Kanuena nu ntangila ku mesu, binuikala kanuyi nulua ne muakuny enu kundi
Hashishe, Zelubabela, muana wa Shalatiele, ne Yoshua, muana wa Yehosadaka, muakuidi wa ha mutu ha bakuabo, ne bantu bonso bakadi bashala, bakatumikila dî dia Nzambi wabo, ne mei a muprofete Hagai, bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi wabo, wakamutuma; ne bantu bakadi batshina ku mpala kua Yehowa
Monai
Hakelanganeye meshi a bualu ebu, wakabanga kudila bikole
Muku wa Petelo mukashi wakadi ne mubidi wandi mukuatshike kahia ka bungi; bakasengelela Yesu bua disama diandi
Mukelenge wakabandamuna ne, Muanda eu udi wa bushuwa, bu mudi mukenji wa Bena Madai ne Bena Pelasa, udi kauyi mua kukudimuka
Pashishe Rebeka ne bena mudimu bende kubanda pa tumelu
Bobo bakela nshobo bu muakenza bana babo bana ba Alona ku mpala kua Davidi mukelenge, ne Sadoka ne Ahimeleke, ne ku mpala kua bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ya bakuidi ne ya Bena Lewi, nsubu ya batatu abo bakadi tuhita tô ne ku nsubu ya bakunyi babo
Bimuma bia mu ditunga adi mbiebi
Maweja Nangila kungambila kabidi ne: Ndi mujadike ne: bantu aba mbantombokele
Hakadiye uya, bakâdisha bikowelu biabo mu nshila
Nunku mukelenge Lehabama wakadikolesha mu Yelushalema, wakakokesha bantu; Lehabama wakadi ne bidimu makumi anai ne tshimue hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete mu Yelushalema, musoko wakasungula Yehowa munkatshi mua bisamba bia Bena Isalele bionso bua kutekamu dina diandi; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Nâma, Muena Amona
Bualu bua hanakalua n abo mu buloba bunakaditshiha bua kubaha, ne bobo bakatangisha mesu abo ku mukuna wonso mule anyi ku mutshi wonso wa mabeshi a bungi, bakafilahu milambu yabo, bakafilahu bintu biakankuatshisha tshiji; bakoshelaku bintu bia muhuya muimpe, bakahongololaku milambu ya bia kunua
Kadi katataka udi ndua kûdi; udi ngamba malu â ha buloba bua disanka dianyi kukumbanadi munda muabo
Bana ba Yakobe badi bapingana mu Kenaane Yozefe upingana, kubambilaye ne: Ndi ndama Shimeyone
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Mu dituku adi nenjimishe mena a mpingu mu buloba, ne bantu kabena bayivuluka kabidi kashidi; nengihate baprofete ne nyuma ya bukoya mu buloba
Kadi mukashi mukuabo wakela dibue dia mpelu dinene ha mutu wa Abimeleke, wakahanda kabalubalu kandi
Luka Yesu wakadi mûle tente ne Nyuma Muimpe, wakafuma ku Yadene, Nyuma wakamulombola mu tshihela tô matuku makumi anai, Diabolo wakadi umuteya
Bisumbu ne Midimu bia Bena Lewi Yeye wakasangisha baminyampala bonso mu Isalele ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi wenda kumpala kuenu
Pashishe ditunga adi dimane kuitaba Maweja Nangila, nenupingane kuenu, kanuyi ne tshilumbu kudi Maweja Nangila, nansha kudi bena Izrayele
Kakuena muntu udi ne tshimbambila bua yeye amusonsole; Muntu kai wakadianjila kumpa tshintu, bua meme mmufute kabidi
Monai, muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi wakumuka, ne munga muanjelo wakalua kusangakena n andi; wakamuambila ne, Ya lubilu, ambila nsongalume eu ne, Yelushalema neikale ne bantu muomumue ne misoko idi kayiyi ne ngumbu, bualu bua bisumbu bivule bia bantu ne bia bimuna nebikalemu
Yeye kabidi wakatulesha dinanga dienu dia mu Nyuma Muimpe
Nenvuishe buloba bikulu ne tshihela tshia tshianana; bukole buabu buakadi bubuheshisha dihetu nebujimine, ne mikuna ya mu Isalele neyishale hatuhu, kakuyi muntu wahitshila ha mitu hai
Bena Yuda bakashiha bena lukuna babo bonso ne miele ya nvita, bakabashiha ne bakababutula ne bakenzela bakadi n abo lukinu bu muakasuabo
Mu diba adi bakokeshi ba ku muelelu wa mai manene nebatuluke mu nkuasa yabo ya bukelenge, nebavule bilulu biabo, nebakohole bivualu biabo bidi ne malenda; nebashale ne dizakala; nebashikame hanshi ha buloba, nebazakale diba dionso, nebakuatshike buowa bualu buenu
Yakobe kubuelela Leya mu nzubu butuku abu
Nehemiya gouverneur wakadi ne Ezela muakuidi ne mufundi ne Bena Lewi, bakadi bayisha bantu, bakambila bantu bonso ne, Dituku edi didi dia tshijila kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu, kanujingi, kanutedi mua dî
Kanungu ka Beena Bukalenga bunene badi ne bukookeshi bwa kufila bidibo bajinga bwa kwakajilula mu mukanda udibo bakokelangana, kadi kabeena beela tukanda to
Hashishe, bana ba mikoko nebadieku mashinde bu muakadibo mua kudia mu budimi buabo bua mashinde, nyama Mulau wikale kudi badi bakoka malu mabi kudibo ne mionshi ya mashimi, badi bamba ne, Endeshe biandi lubilu, Mulau wikale kudi badi babikila bualu bubi ne, Mbualu buakane, Mulau wikale kudi badi badimona bu bena meji, Mulau wikale kudi badi ne bukitu mu kunua kua maluvu badi babingisha muntu muhila ku mbueshilu, Nunku bu mudi ludimi lua kahia luosha misengeleke ya mponda, Bua malu â tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakatema kudi bantu bandi, Yeye neabishe dibendela diandi bua kusangishaku ba mu bisamba bidi kule, Kakuena umue wabo udi uhanga anyi udi ulenduka mu nshila; Mikete yabo idi misakisha bimpe, Tshibingu tshiabo netshikale bu Mu dituku adi nebele bantu aba tshibingu Yeshaya Mu tshidimu tshiakafua mukelenge Uziya nakamona Mukelenge mushikame mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, muikale kulu ne mubandishibue mulu, ne tshilulu tshia kumanda kua muzabi wandi tshia kûsha ntempelo tente
Mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene budimi nebuhingane kudi wakabuhana, kudi muena budimi mene
Mutumikidi wa mikenji kena ukengeshibua; mutshima wa muena meji udi ujingulula bikondo ne ngenzelu
Bakabunvua bakula mu miaku mikuabo, batumbisha Nzambi
Kanuenji munudi basue to
Bantu bonso bakamba hohamue ne, Netuenze mei onso akutuambila Yehowa Mose wakambila Yehowa mei akamba bantu
Yeye wakangata tupitene tua bantu lukama ne bantu banene bonso ne bakokeshi ba bantu ba mu buloba, bakafuma ne mukelenge mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bakabuela ku tshibi tshia ku mutu mu nsubu wa mukelenge, bakashikika mukelenge mu nkuasa wa bukelenge
Mu dituku adi nembikile muntu wanyi Eleyakima, muana wa Hilekiya, nemmuluatshishe tshivualu tshiebe, nemmujingile mukaba webe, nenfile bukokeshi buebe mu bianza biandi; ne yeye neikale tatu kudi ba mu Yelushalema ne kudi ba mu Bena Yuda
Yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi Wamba ne, Muntu yonso aluate muele wandi wa nvita, endakane ku tshibi ne ku tshibi mu tshitudilu tshionso, ashihe muan abo mulume ne mulunda wandi ne muena mutumba n andi
Enzelai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue adibo kabayi basonge; nuenu nenuoshilehu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, milambu; nenufile kabidi milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, nenudieku; nenusanke ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Matayo Hakashikisha Yesu kuyisha bayidi bandi dikumi ne babidi mikenshi yandi, yeye wakumukaku bualu bua kuyisheye bantu mu misoko yabo ne bua kubambileye bualu bua Nzambi
Kanungu ka Badi mwa kudidila Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kwambaku ne dîyi didibu baswa kupatula kadieena diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu kudi: a Mulombodi wa ditunga, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi alonda dîba divwabo bamutumina dîyi dimana kwanyisha kashidi; b Bukalenge bunene, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi alonda dimutuminabu dia dîyi dimana kwanyisha kashidi, c Batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi batshipwita bakulumpa bûngi butwa ku tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena mu Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi aloonda dianyisha diaadi kashidi
Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Bika biebe, udi mutuile mpala hanshi tshinyi
Bualu ebu buakalua bubi, bualu bua bantu bakaya kutendelela kamue ne kukuabo tô ne ku Dana
Bakenza nunku: bakangata ngombe ibidi yakadi ne mabele, bakayisuika ku dikalu, bakinshidila bana bai mu nsubu wai; bakateka mushete wa Yehowa ha dikalu, ne mushete mukuabo wakadi ne bifuanyikishi bia or bia mpuku ne bia masungu
Nuishayi bimuna mayi
Diba adi, nuebejangane, nulondakajangane bimpe bua kujadika ne: bualu ebu mbulelela anyi
Simona Petelo wakalonda Yesu, ne muyidi mukuabo
udibo basungula Mulombodi wa Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata, ndi ngamba kumpala kwa Nzambi ne Ditunga ne : nendondesha ne nensungidila Dîyi dikulu ne mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga; nenshindika budikadidi ne bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia Ditunga; nendaminyina bobumwe bwa Ditunga; nendonda amu dijinga dia bantu bônso ne kaneemu ka mapa a bumuntu; nendifila ne bukole bônso mu dilengeja dia nsombelu wa bantu ne mu difila dia bupole; nenkumbaja midimu minene idibo bampeesha mu dilonda dia mêyi ne anu bu mupika menemene wa bantu

Buloba buebe budi hanyi
Nakuteka mutshima wanyi mu kukeba kua meji ne mu kujingulula kua buhote ne malu a tshianana; nakamanya ne bualu ehu kabidi budi bu kuihata kua luhehele
Mampa a tshijila anudi nundambula, ashale anu pa mesa apu kashidi

Neumone malu ahita abu
Bingikala ne matuhakana mu kuamba kuanyi, tshiena n au mu lungenyi luanyi; bulelela, mu nshila yonso tuakanulesha bualu ebu mu malu onso
Yesu wakabambila ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Mu dituku dialedibua bintu bionso tshiakabidi, hashikama Muana wa muntu mu nkuasa wa butumbi buandi, nuenu kabidi bakundonda, nenushikame mu nkuasa dikumi ne ibidi, nulumbuluisha bisamba dikumi ne bibidi bia Isalele
Nenkukebe ne mutshima wanyi mujima; Nakulama dî diebe mu mutshima wanyi, Wewe Yehowa, usankishibue, Mishiku yanyi idi ilondela bantu Ndi ne disanka mu dilonda dia mei ebe, Nengelangane meji bua mikenji yebe, Nendisankishe mu mikenji yebe mifunda, Wenzele muntu webe malu mimpe makumbane, Utabashe mesu anyi, bua meme kumona Ndi muenyi ha buloba ebu; Muoyo wanyi udi muhandike bua dijinga dindi n adi Wewe udi ubela badi badisue, badi bedibue mulau, Ungumushile dihetu ne kulengulula, Hashikama baminyampala bangelela tshifufu, Mei ebe awakammanyisha adi disanka dianyi, Muoyo wanyi udi ulamata ku luhuishi; Nakakulondela bienzedi bianyi, ne wewe wakungitaba
Nanku muntu yonsu udi ushipa muntu mukuabu mu mpukapuka, kayi nende ne muoyi mubi, neanyemene mu tshimenga tshimue tshia ku bimenga ebi bua kudipandisha
Dikoba dianyi diakulua difike, diakuhuluka, Kuimba kua lunzenze luanyi kuakuandamuka madilu, Yobo Nakahunga tshihungidi ne mesu anyi, Bua buhianyi bua kudi Nzambi wa mu diulu budi mua kuikala tshinyi
Kadi padi mutuangaji umona ne: mputa awu kena mondoke, kabidi muaba awu kawena boya bukunze, nenku mutuangaji anji kuteka muntu awu pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete
Neabuele kabidi mu buloba bulengele, neabutule binunu makumi a bantu; kadi ba mu Edome, ba mu Moaba ne tshituha tshinene tshia Bena Amona nebahanduke mu bianza biandi
Muyidi eu mene wakamba malu â, wakâfunda; tudi bamanye ne, Dî diandi ndilelela
Misangu mikuabu, Mvidi Mukulu udi mua kuitaba, bua utshipe bena Izrayele muaba awu mu dina dianyi

Anu bana benu bena Levi nkayabu ke badi mua kunuambuluisha ku midimu yonsu ya mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Muntu yonsu uvua musombe mu ditunga diabu, mu tshisamba tshiabu, wakula muakulu wa ditunga diabu
Esetê Bena Yuda Badi Babutula Bena Lukuna Babo Mu ngondo wa dikumi ne ibidi, ngondo wa Adâ mene, mu dituku dia dikumi ne asatu dia ngondo eu, bakamba diba dia kumana mukenji wa mukelenge kufika, mu dituku diakatekemenabo kudi bena lukuna ba Bena Yuda bua kubakokeshabo kadi bualu buakakudimuka, ne Bena Yuda bakakokesha bena lukuna babo , Bena Yuda bakadisangisha mu misoko yabo mu nseke yonso ya mukelenge Ahashawelosha bua kukuatabo honso bakasua kubenzela bibi; nansha muntu wakamanya mua kuimana ku mpala kuabo, bualu bua ditshina diabo diakakuata bantu bonso
Kadi badi bamubenga, udi ubanyoka lukasa, ubabutula
Bakafika nunku dituku dia dikumi ne ditanu dia ngondo muibidi hakumukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Buonso buabi bisatu biakadi ne madidishi ku nseke yonso mabuikila ne tubaya tutshiamakashe

Yesu wakamuambila ne, Bika, ambula bulalu buebe, endaku

Numanye ne, Lutulu lua Mukelenge wetu nduhandu; bu mudi muan etu munanga Paulo kabidi, bua lungenyi luakamuhabo, wakanufundila; bu mudiye wenza kabidi mu mikanda yandi yonso wambamu bua malu â, munda muai mudi manga malu adi makole ha kuajingulula, adi bantu badi kabai bayishibue ne ba mitshima mitekete bakonyangasha mei, bu mudibo benzela mei makuabo mu Mukanda wa Nzambi, bua dibutuka diabo
Nunku tudi tuamba ne, Muntu udi ubingishibua ku ditabusha, kenku kuenza kua mikenshi

Nasha kakese

Kadi katumushipi nansha

Yeye wakalota tshilota tshikuabo, wakatshiawila bana babo, wakabambila ne, Monai, nakulota tshilota tshikuabo, nakumona diba ne ngondo ne mitoto dikumi ne umue, biakunkukuila
Wakalala tulu muinshi mua mutshi wa genêt: mona, muanjelo wakamulenga tshianza, wakamuambila ne, Juka biebe, udie
Bamanye biabo ne, Nzambi udi ukokesha bana ba Yakoba Badi balukila ku dilolo ku dilolo, bela mikunda bu mbua, Badi bendakana eku ne eku bakeba bia kudia, ne bikalabo kabayi bûkuta, badi Kadi meme hanyi nengimbe bua bukole buebe, Bukole buanyi, nenkuimbile misambu ya kukutumbisha n ai, Misambu Wewe Nzambi, wakutubenga, wakuhanduka mualu wetu wa nvita; Wakuzakasha buloba, wakubuhanda mitanta; Wakumueneshila bantu bebe malu makole akukengabo; Wakatumikila badi bakunemeka dibendele, bua bobo banyemeneku Bua bantu bebe baudi munange babandishibue, Nzambi wakuamba dî mu tshijila tshiandi ne, Gilada nguanyi; Manashe nguanyi kabidi; Moaba udi luesu luanyi lua mai a kuowa, ndi Wanfikisha mu musoko wa ngumbu ya nvita nganyi
Teka tshiamu etshi munda mua nseke mai ya tshioshelu ne hankatshi, mu bule buatshi
Pa tshilamba atshi, bavua bateka milongu ya mabue a mushinga mukole inayi: mulongu wa kumpala uvua ne dibue dia rubise, dia topaze ne dia emerode

Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu nutu nuadibingisha ku mesu kua bantu, kadi Nzambi udi mumanye mitshima yenu; tshintu tshidi tshitumba ku mesu kua bantu tshidi tshinyanguka ku mesu kua Nzambi
Mutuangaji neambule mayi a bululu awu, a kutshipa nawu muntu
Muntu wakalua, wakambila nfumu wandi malu â
Dielulula Bena Izrayele badi batshimuna mukalenga Oge Pashishe tuetu kubenda bua kupitshila mu ditunga dia Bashane
Nunku Yehowa wakateka nyuma wa kudinga mukana mua baprofete bebe bonso; Yehowa wakamba malu mabi bualu buebe
Nomba Mpungi ya Tshiamu tshia Argent Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Enza biebe mpungi ibidi ya tshiamu tshia argent tshiakafulabo, wewe neubikile n ai bantu bua kutendelela ne bua kubisha luendu
Balaka wakabikila Bena Zebuluna ne Bena Nafatale ku Kedeshe; bantu binunu dikumi bakamulonda ku makasa andi; ne Debola wakaya n andi
Genese Yosefe Udi Ujinguluila Bena Lukanu Bilota Biabo Hakashika malu au, mutuadi wa maluvu wa mukelenge wa Ejipitu ne mulambi wa bidia biandi bakafikisha mukelenge wabo wa Ejipitu munda
Tangilai, nakuteka muoyo ne malu mimpe, ne lufu ne malu mabi ku mpala kuenu lelu; mukenji unakunuelela lelu bua kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne mikandu yandi: nunku nenuikale ne muoyo, nenukumbane ba bungi, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu buloba bunuyaya kubuhiana
Bua tudi bamumanye yeye wakamba ne, Kusombuela mbualu buanyi, nempingishile bantu difutu diabo, wakamba kabidi ne, Mukelenge nealumbuluishe bantu bandi
Nu nku Mose wakela di, bakamanyi shangana mu tshitudilu ne, Nansha mulume nansha mukashi kalu ne bintu bikuabo bia tshitendelelu
Lewitiki Milambu ya Mibi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bienza muntu bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia, bienza muakuidi muela manyi ha mutu bualu bubi budi buhisha bantu, yeye nealele mulambu wa muana wa ngombe udi kayi ne tshitema kudi Yehowa, bu mulambu wa kubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Yeye udi ne bua kuya n ebe bua tshinyi
Moshe kuamba ne: Nenujadike mundi tshiyi ndienzela malu nkayanyi to, kabidi mudi Maweja Nangila nkayende muntume bua kukumbaja bionsu ebi
Kabena babikila mamu andi ne, Malia, anyi
Yesu wakabakudimuna dî ne, Bumbulai ntempelo eu, nemubishe kabidi matuku asatu
Moshe ne Arone kuboya butu bua muiku, kuya nabu kumpala kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Amrame uvua musele Yokebede, muana wa Levi, mulelela mu Ejipitu
Ne ha mpala handi hakadi dina difunda ne, Ne nakatangila mukashi mukuatshike ne mashi a basanto, ne mashi a bamanyishi ba Yesu
Nanku, mu matuku dikumi ne anayi a ngondu wa kumpala ewu, dilolu menemene, nenungenzele tshibilu etshi, bilondeshile mikenji yatshi ne bibidilu biatshi
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu bakuabo tshiakaya n abo, ne mikoko ne ngombe ne bimuna bia bungi
Lekelai kutontolola, bu muakatontolola bakuabo babo, bakashihibua kudi mushihi
Bituamba ne, Tudi ne buobumue n andi, hatutshidi tuenda mu midima, tudi tushima, ne katuena tuenza bualu bulelela; kadi bituenda mu munya, bu mudiye mu munya, tudi tuikalangana ne buobumue, ne mashi a Yesu, Muan andi, adi atulengesha ku mibi yonso
Ba bana ba Lehabeya, Yishiya wakadi kahita
Kuvualaye tshiakabidi bilamba biende bia lufuila abi
Anu bimuna ne bintu bikuabo biakahuolabo bia mu musoko, Bena Isalele bakabiangata bu bintu biabo bu mu dî dia Yehowa diakambileye Yoshua
Ndi nyingalala
Bakasesuka, bakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana, ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakaya ne bantu bandi bonso bua kusangana n abo nvita ku Edelei
Numushipe bua kuenza tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila
Nujadike ne: buloba ne budi ne bufuke, anyi budi buatuka
Kabobo bonso bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu ne Mose kabakenza nunku, anyi
Bonsu babidi kuya natshi tshianyima, kubuikila tatuabu uvua butaka
Yeye wa kamba ne, Ndi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, kutshinyi bua kuya mu Ejipitu, bualu bua nenkuvuisheku tshisamba tshmene nenye n ebe mu Ejipitu, nennumusheku kabidi bulelela, Yosefe neateke bianza biandi ha mesu ebe Yakoba Wakabika ku Be sheba, bana balume ba Isalele bakatuala Yakoba tatu abo ne bana babo ne bakashi babo mu makalu akabatumma Palo
maboko ne makasa andi bu tshiamu tshia mitaku tshinonoke, tshiona tshia mei andi tshiakadi bu tshiona tshia musumba wa bantu
Bantu aba bakateleja matshu abo bimpe bua kujingululabo mei akambeye; nunku bakambilangana ne, E, muan enu, Bene hadada
Meme nentume Sisela, kapitene ka masalayi a Yabina, kûdi ku musulu wa Kishona, ne makalu andi a nvita ne tshisumbu tshiandi tshinene; nemmufile mu bianza biebe
Hakatangila Lea ne, Tshiena ndela bana kabidi, yeye wakangata Zilepa, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, wakamufila kudi Yakoba bu mukashi wandi
Hakahita bidimu bibidi, mala andi akahatuka bualu bua disama diandi; yeye wakafua bua masama makole
Bualu bua Mukelenge muine neahueke mu diulu wela dî dikole, ne dî dia muanjelo mutambe bakuabo bunene, ne dî dia mpungi wa Nzambi; ne bantu bafue mu Kilisto nebabike diambedi; ne hasnishe tuetu batshidi ne muoyo badibo bashîa netuangatshibue n abo hohamue mu matutu, bua kusangila ne Mukelenge mu luhehele; nunku netuikale ne Mukelenge tshiendelele
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Nuenu nudi nungambile lungenyi kai lua kukudimuna n alu bantu aba badi bangambila ne, Uheheshe tshikokedi tshiakatukengesha n atshi tatu ebe
Mose wakamuambila ne, Hanaluhuka mu musoko eu, nengolole bianza bianyi kudi Yehowa, makubakuba neashike, mabue a nvula neashike kabidi, bualu bua kukumanyisha ne buloba budi bua Yehowa
Ndi mumvue mudibu banjane
Yoaba wakateka mei mukana muandi
Yeye udi muan etu
Hakatangila mukelenge wa Ai bualu ebu, wakabika lubilu ne dinda ne bantu bandi bonso, bakaluhuka mu musoko bua kuluangana ne Bena Isalele mu muaba wakasungulabo ku mpala kua mpata wa Alabâ; kadi yeye kakamanya ne balaminyi bakadi ku nyima kua musoko
Maweja Nangila, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi ne bukole, tshidi tshibutula baluishi bebe
Wakidikisha tshibuelelu atshi ne luidi luakidikishileye n alu bikuabo, nsubu yatshi ya bansentedi, biluwa biatshi, ne mbalanda watshi; ne wakabisangisha bikale ne bunene buobumue ne bua bikuabo
Muakuidi wakamuambila ne, Muele wa nvita wa Goleyata, Muena Peleshete, uwakashiha mu tshibanda tshia Ela, udiku, udi mujingila mu tshilulu ku nyima kua efoda; biwasua kuwangata, uwangate, bualu bua kakuena muele mukuabo kunoko
Ndi ntshijadika ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne nyama yonso bidi n enu bintu bionso bia ha buloba biakaluhuka mu buatu
Biunvua Shaula lumu elu, yeye neanshihe
Halua muan abo ne muntu mufue bua kumuambula, yeye mene ngudi ne bua kuosha tshitalu tshiandi, ne hambeye kuhatula mifuba yandi ha mbelu, neakose munga muntu udi munda mua nsubu ne, Muntu mukuabo udi n ebe, anyi
Hashishe Yoaba wakalua kudi mukelenge, wakamuebesha ne, Wewe Wakenza tshinyi
Bua bualu ebu bakuidi ba Dagona anyi bakuabo bakadi balue mu nsubu wa Dagona kabena hadiata makasa ku tshibuelelu tshia Dagona mu Ashedodo tô ne lelu
Kabakuenza kabidi buenzayi ebu to
Labane kuambila Yakobe ne: Wewe udi mulele wanyi, tudi mufu umue
Bana ba Zakai, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asambombo
Akosele muminu wa nyunyi umue pa luesu lua dibumba, luikale ne mayi a mpokolu
Katuena tutamba kuobokela, bu mutuakadi katui bafike kunudi; kadi tuetu tuakadianjila kufika tô ne kunudi ne lumu luimpe lua Kilisto
Bayishe bantu banyi ditahuluka didi hankatshi ha bintu bia tshijila ne bintu bia hatuhu, habaleshe mua kujingulula malu adi atahulula bintu bidi bibiha ku bintu bidi kabiyi bibiha
Eu mmudimu wa meku a Bena Gêshona udibo benza ne majitu adibo batuala nebabidie bilulu bidi binyunguluka nsubu wa tshitendelu, ne ntenta mene wa kusambakena, ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu, ne tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge tshidi ha mutu hatshi, ne tshilulu tshidi ku mbelu kua nsubu, ne bilulu bia ku luhangu, ne tshilulu tshidi ku tshibi tshia luhangu tshidi hehi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu tshidi tshinyunguluka tshioshelu tshia kahia, ne nshinga ya ku luhangu, ne bintu bionso bidibo benza n abi mudimu, bobo nebenze mudimu eu
Kadi Yakobe kuwinyika ne: Ngalede
Hawabuikila diulu, ne nvula kena uloka bualu bua bobo bakukuenzela wewe bibi, biatendelelabo ku muaba eu, ne biatondabo mibi yabo kudi dina diebe, ne bialekelabo mibi yabo bualu bua wewe wakabakengesha, unvue biebe mu diulu, ubuikidile bantu bebe ne Bena Isalele mibi yabo, hawabayisha nshila muimpe udibo ne bua kuendela; ulokeshe nvula ha buloba buwakaha bantu bebe bu buhianyi buabo
Mukelenge Agipa udi mumanye bua malu â; ndi muambilau ne dikima; bualu bua ndi ngitabusha ne, Kakuena bualu bumue bua mu malu â budi bumusokome, bua bualu ebu kabuakenjibua mu ditumba dia nsubu
Ku tshibangidilu Yesu wakadi mumanye bakadi kabai bitabushe, wakadi mumanye wamutungila tshitungu
Nunku buonso buabo bakafika ku mpata, bakahanduka
Tatu wabo wakabebesha ne, Yeye wakaya mu nshila kai
Kadi Bena Lewi bakumuka kundi, bakaya kule, hakahambuka Bena Isalele aba bakandekela bua kulondabo mpingu yabo, badituadile dihila diabo bua mibi yabo
Genese Kuledibua kua Isaka Yehowa wakahingana kudi Sala bu muakambeye, ne wakenzela Sala bu muakambeye
Umushe maluvu ebe
Bobo bakakeba mena abo mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua bankambua, kadi kabakâsangana; nunku bakadi bu bantu banyanguke, bakabumusha mu buakuidi
Nulengeshe bianza bienu, nuenu bantu babi, nutokeshe mitshima yenu, nuenu bena mitshima ibidi
Yehoyakina wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne muanda mukulu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema ngondo isatu ne matuku dikumi; Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kadi tô ne ku dituku edi habalabo mei a Mose, tshilulu tshikudika tshidi tshilala ku mitshima yabo
Ne hamanabo kubala mukanda eu munkatshi muenu, nûbadishe bena ekelesia ba mu Laodikiya kabidi; ne nuenu kabidi nubale mukanda wanyi udi ufuma ku Laodikiya
Pashishe apingane mu mitanda
Muntu wa mu Maona wakadiku wakadi ne bintu biandi ku mukuna wa Kâmele; wakadi muntu munene, wakadi ne mikoko binunu bisatu ne mbushi tshinunu; yeye wakadi ukosa miosa ya mikoko yandi mu Kâmele
Kutufikishi hadi mateyi
Nanku Balaame kutuuta mpunde tshiakabidi
Tshionso tshiudi ukengela bua nsubu wa Nzambi webe, tshiudi ne bua kufila, utshiangate mu tshibutshilu tshia mu nsubu wa mukelenge
Tuye n ebe, tuhunge tshihungidi, wewe ne meme, tshihungidi etshi tshikale bu kuditshiha kua bualu munkatshi muetu
Neushihe bonso ba mu Isalele badi bashala ne muoyo mu kuhumuna eku kua tshiji tshiebe tshikole ham bidi ha Yelushalema, anyi
Bienzedi Mu Ikonio bakabuela diakamue mu nsunagoga wa Bena Yuda, bakambila bantu dî diakitabushisha ba bungi, Bena Yuda ne Bena Gelika
Bakamba ne, Mose wakitabusha bualu bua kufunda mukanda wa kushiha dibaka, ne bua kumumusha
Nenkusungile wewe ne musoko eu mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû; nenduile bena musoko eu nvita
Nunku umushai bukoya buonso ne divulangana dia malu mabi, nuitabushe dî ne kalolo didi dikunyibua munda muenu, didi dimanye mua kusungila mioyo yenu
Tuetu kubashipa, katuyi bashiye muntu nansha umue ne muoyi
Mu ngondo wa kumudilu ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne anai dilolo nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene to ne ku dituku dia makumi abidi ne dimue dilolo
Nakuluila bua kutuma kahia ha buloba; nakadi musue kateme
Hashishe Davidi wakajuka ha buloba, wakowa mai, wakataha manyi ham bidi, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo; wakabuela mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wakamutendelela; nunku wakahingana ku nsubu kuandi; hakambeye dî, bakamuha bia kudia, yeye wakadia
Wakunuenzela nunku bua kunumanyisha ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi; kakuena Nzambi mukuabo
Nengenzele ba ha buloba abu mei onso anakamba bualu buabu, adi mafunda mu mukanda eu, adi Yelemiya muambe bua kuhisha n au bisamba bionso bia bantu
Hashishe yeye wakumuka kudi Elisha, wakahingana kudi mukelenge wandi
Petelo wakamukonka ne, Mukelenge, wewe udi ungowesha meme makasa, anyi
Utubule disoso mu tshimanu tshia nsubu ku mesu kuabo, hatukilaku ne bintu biebe
Bobo bakadila kudi Yehowa, bakamba ne, Tuakenza bibi, bualu bua tuetu tuakalekela Yehowa, tuakakuatshila Babâla ne Bashatelota mudimu; kadi katataka utusungile mu bianza bia badi n etu lukuna, ne tuetu netukukuatshile mudimu
Yeye wakamba ne, Wangate muan ebe mulume, muana umuehele, ûdi munange, Isaka mene, uye biebe mu buloba bua Moliya, umufileku bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kalua, ha mutu ha mukuna undualua kukulesha
Ke mundi nkumbaja bionsu bimvua mulaye tatuebe Abrahame
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai matuku alualua, hikalabo kabayi babikila tshibumba ne, Tofete, anyi ne, Luhongo lua muana mulume wa Hinoma; kadi nebalubikile ne, Luhongo lua Kushihelamu Bantu; bualu bua nebajike bantu mu Tofete, kakuena kuikala muaba mukuabo wa kubajikamu
Neahunge n ebe tshihungidi, Udi mua kunaya handi bu mûdi unaya ne nyunyu, anyi
Mukelenge wakela dî diandi, bakalua ne mabue manene a mushinga mukole, bakasa makunshi a nsubu ne mabue musonga
Nanku bua kulama ntenta muibidi bimpe, kutentakajabu ntenta ibidi: ewu wa tshiseba tshia mukoku wa tshimpanga tshimane kulaba kakula, mukuabu wa tshiseba tshia nyama wa nkonga
Nuenu kumvua diyi dia Maweja Nangila, wakula nenu munkatshi mua kapia, kadi kanuyi numumona to
Biwenza nunku, ne Bikala Nzambi numuambile dî diandi nunku, wewe neumanye mua kuikala ne bukole ne bantu nebaye ku miaba yabo talalâ
Bakambila Bena Gaza ne, Shimishona wakulua munemu
Maweja Nangila neafuile nsongakaji awu luse, bualu tatuende kavua musue bua abikumbaje to
Bualu bobu balenga tshintu tshia tshijila menemene, nebafue
Ebi mbintu binudi mua kuangata kudibo or ne argent ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bilulu bia bleu ne bilulu bifikuluke ne bilulu bikunze kunzû ne bilulu bia lin ne miosa ya mbushi, ne biseba bia bimpanga bina mu mai makunze, ne biseba bia nkonge ne mutshi wa acacia, ne manyi a muinda, manananshi adibo bela mu manyi a kulaba ham bidi, ne manyi adi atua dihembu, mabue a mushinga mukole adibo bateka mu efoda ne mu tshiamu tshidibo baluata ha tshiadi
Yeye wakamutua muele, ne yeye wakafua
Mukelenge wakafudila biamu ebi bionso mu maloba a dime a mu mpata wa Yadene, hankatshi ha Sukota ne Saletana
Muntu yonsu udi ubuela mu nzubu awu matuku avuabu bamuinjile, bamukange, neapie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Kanuena bamanye ne, Bundi n abu mbua kuikala mu malu a Tatu wanyi
Mbulamatadi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi mwa kwikala ne bintu biende nkayende anyi ne bintu bia mu tshibûngi bipeta bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu anyi bunkambwa
Bakamuambila ne, Kakuena umena tshiota tshienu udi muidika dinu edi
Nenganyishe dipembu dia mupuya wa mulambu awu
Mu matuku a bakelenge aba Nzambi wa mu diulu neajadike bukelenge bukuabo budi kabuyi bubutudibua tshiendelele
Bantu bakumuka mu buhika bakafila milambu ya kuosha kudi Nzambi wa Isalele, balume ba ngombe dikumi ne babidi bua Bena Isalele bonso, ne bimpanga makumi tshitema ne bisambombo ne bana ba mikoko makumi muanda mutekete ne muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu ya mbushi dikumi ne ibidi bu milambu ya kubuikila n ai mibi yabo: bionso ebi biakadi milambu ya kuoshela Yehowa
Mesu enu kâbatangidi ne dinanga, kanubafuidi luse; shihai bantu bakulumpe, bansongalume ne mishikankunde, bana batekete ne bakashi; kadi kanuyi ha buihi ne muntu umue udi ne tshimanyinu atshi
Udi mumanye mua kubuela munda mua mamu wandi tshiakabidi, amulele, anyi
Bakatuma miloho kudi Bena Kîyata yalima bambila ne, Bena Peleshete bakahingisha mushete wa Yehowa; luai bienu, nuye n au kuenu
Bobo bakimana ku mpala kua Mose ne kua Eleazâ, muakuidi ne ku mpala kua bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bakamba ne, Tatu wetu wakafua mu tshihela, yeye kakadi munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia Kola tshiakadisangisha kudi Yehowa, kadi yeye wakafua anu bualu bua mibi yandi, yeye kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha
Yakobe udi unyemena kua mansebende Labane Esawu kufika munda bikole bua lupemba luvua Yakobe mumunyenge
Ndi musue kubamanyisha mikenji yanyi, bua bayilonde, bannemeke patshidibu ne muoyi
Yehowa wakasomba n enu mpala ha mpala ha mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, Meme nakimana hankatshi henu ne Yehowa tshikondo atshi, bua kunulesha dî dia Yehowa; nuenu nuakatshina bualu bua kahia, kanuakabanda ku mukuna; yeye wakamba ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Beena ku Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi ne tshia kujadika ne badi bamanyi bapiluke mu mianda ya lupetu, ya mêyi ne mikandu ne ya diludika dia mianda ya mbulamatadi ne badi ne tshia kujadika kabidi ne bakaadi bênza midimu eyi bidimu kabiyi bishadila ku dikumi
Bananga, kanukemi bua dikenga didi bu kahia munkatshi muenu diakaluila kunudi bu diteta, bu bualu buhia buhia buakanukuata; kadi bualu bua nudi babanyanganyi ba makenga a Kilisto, nusanke; bua nuenu nusanke kabidi ne disanka dinene ku dibuluibua dia butumbi buandi
Kadi kabavua bamuitaba to, bualu bavua ne kanyinganyinga bua dikenga divuabu nadi mu bupika
Kungambilaye kabidi ne: Bangayi luendu
Bakuabo bakitabusha, bakadisangisha ne Paulo ne Sila; tshisumbu tshinene tshia Bena Gelika bakadi batshina Nzambi ne bakashi ba butumbi ba bungi bakenza nunka kabidi
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mikenji idi itangila madilu Nadabe ne Abiku bavua bana ba balume ba Arone
Bantu bakatamba kuelangana mpata ya bualu buandi mu musokoko; bakuabo bakamba ne, Udi muntu muimpe; bakuabo ne, Nasha, yeye udi uhambuisha bantu
Hashishe nebamone Muana wa muntu ulua mu ditutu ne bukole ne butumbi bunene

Samuele wakambila Yishai ne, Yehowa kena musungule aba
Nutshisungule ku bintu bimpe binudi nupeta, bua kundambula

Misangu mikuabu udi mua kundelela muana wa balume
Bena Isalele bakabika, bakaya ku Betele, bakebesha Nzambi bualu bua kuenzabo; bakamba ne, Ba kutudi badianjile kuluisha Bena Benyamina mbanganyi
Ngasa ikale ne buonso buenu
Bua Bena Makedonia ne Bena Akaya bakasanka bua kusangisha bintu bikuabo bua kukuatshisha n abi bahele ba munkatshi mua basanto ba mu Yelushalema

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bikala muntu muakane, ne bienzeye malu adi makanangane ne mikenji ne malu adi makane, ne bikaleye kayi mudie munyinyi muelele mpingu ha mikuna, kayi muanze kutangisha mesu andi ku mpingu ya ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele; bikaleye kayi munyange mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi, ne bikaleye kayi mulue hehi ne mukashi mu tshikondo tshia tshijila tshiandi; bikaleye kayi muenzele mukuabo bibi, kadi muhingashile muena dibanza tshieya tshiandi, kayi munyenge bintu ku bukole, kadi muhe bakadi ne nzala bia kudia biandi, ne muluatshishe bakadi butaka bivualu; bikaleye kayi musombeshe mukuabo bintu bua kuheta kasombelu ka ha mutu, kayi mudiangatshile makasa; biumusheye tshianza tshiandi ku malu mabi, biakoseye bilumbu bia hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu anu ne kulumbulula kuakane, bialondeye mikenji yanyi, biatumikileye mei anyi bua kuenzeye bimpe, muntu eu udi muakane, neikale ne muoyo bulelela
Biaya bantu bebe bua kuluanganabo ne bena lukuna babo, mu nshila yonso ûdi ubatumina, ne biakutendelelabo ku musoko eu uwakusungula, ne ku nsubu eu unakuibakila dina diebe, unvue kulomba kuabo ne kutendekena kuabo mu diulu, ujadike malu abo
Padi Arone ufika muaba wa tshijila menemene, udi wenza bionsu bidi bikengela bua kujikija mikiya ivua muaba awu, bua buntomboji ne bubi bua bena Izrayele

Bana ba balume ba Oteniele: Hatata
Mukashi wa Gilada wakamulelela bana ba balume; hakakola bana ba mukashi wandi mene, bobo bakihata Yefeta, bakamuambila ne, Wewe kuena ne buhianyi mu nsubu wa tatu wetu, bualu bua wewe udi muana wa mukashi wa bende
Nshila wa bantu bakane nkuehuka ku malu mabi, Kudisua kudi kuya ku mpala kua dibutuka, Kuikala ne mutshima muhuekele diatshimue ne badihuekeshi kudi kutamba Udi unvua dî ne ntema neahete diakalengele; Badi babikila muena meji ne, Mujinguludi wa mianda; Lungenyi ludi bu mushimi wa mai a muoyo kudi muntu udi n alu, Mutshima wa muena meji udi uyisha mukana muandi lungenyi, Mei malengele adi bu dikatshi dia buitshi, Nshila udiku udi mululame ku mesu kua muntu, Muoyo wa muena mudimu udi usamina bia kudia udi umuenzesha mudimu, Muntu mulembakana Muena mashimi udi utudisha matandu; Muena tshimbambila udi uteya muena mutumba n andi, Udi ubuikila mesu andi bua kuhangidisha malu a bunsonge, Nsuki mitoke tô idi tshifulu tshia butumbi, Udi kayi ukuata tshiji lubilu udi uhita muena bukitu buimpe, Badi belela nshobo ha bibelu, Nsumuinu Kuikala ne diampa diume ne ditalala nkutamba kuikala ne nsubu mule tente ne Muhika udi wenza mudimu wandi ne meji neakokeshe muana mulume wa mu tshiota Luesu ludiku lua kulengesha tshiamu tshia argent, tshikutu tshidiku tshia Muenji wa malu mabi udi uteleja matshu andi ku mishiku idi ihatula mei mabi; Muntu udi useka muhele udi uhenda Mufuki wandi, Bikulu badi tshifulu tshia butumbi tshia bantu banunu; butumbi bua bana mbatatu babo
Hakahita bu tshituha tshia diba, mukuabo wakamba ne, Bulelela, muntu eu wakadi ne Yesu, bualu bua yeye udi Muena Galela
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Yeye wakamba ne, Bualu ebu nebuenjibue bu mu mei enu, muntu utuasangana n alu, yeye neikale muhika wanyi, ne bakuabo benu nebahanduke
Misangu itanu nakangata mikumu kudi Bena Yuda makumi anai bumushe umue
Bualu bidimu bisambombu bidiye munuenzele mudimu, mmunupeteshe bintu bia bungi, bipite misangu ibidi binuvua mua kupeta kudi muena mudimu unudi nufuta
Nganyi wa munkatshi mua nzambi yonso ya bisamba wakasungila buloba buabo mu tshianza tshianyi, bua Yehowa amanye mua kusungila Yelushalema mu tshianza tshianyi
Ke munudi nuenu kabidi mua kundambula tshintu ku tshia dikumi tshinudi nupeta kudi bana benu bena Izrayele
Ebu budi bualu bundi nuambila ne, Nebajimishile bantu mibi yabo yonso ne bihendu biabo bidibo bahenda n abi Nzambi, kadi kabena babajimishila bihendu bidibo bahenda n abi Nyuma
Bakalekela nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo, bakakuatshila Bashela ne mpingu mudimu; tshiji tshia Nzambi tshiakadi kudi Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema bualu bua bobo bakenza bualu ebu bubi
Neumushe dianyi dionso bu muakenzeye ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neadioshe ha tshioshelu bu muakenzeye ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Hakebesha Davidi Yehowa, yeye wakamuambila ne, Kubandi; ya ha nyima habo, ufike kudibo ha buludiludi ne mitshi ya mûr
Mushiki wa mabue ne dibue edi bidi bijadika ne: Meme ne wewe katuena mua kusambuka mabue aa ne meji a kuenzelangana bibi to
Kubatshinyi nansha, kukuatshiki buowa ku mesu kuabo, bua badi diku dia bantombokedi
Buowa buakakuata bantu bonso bakadi ha buihi n abo; malu â onso akadi enda ambibua mu buloba buonso bua mikuna ya Yudaya
kadi nealumbuluishe bahele ne buakane, Buakane nebuikale mukaba wa mu tshimono tshiandi, Tshimungu netshiule mu nsubu umue ne muana wa mukoko, Mukashi wa ngombe ne nkashama nebidie mashinde hohamue, Muana utshidi wamua mabele neanayile ha mutu ha buina bua nyoka wa dikala, Kabiena bienzela bikuabo bintu bibi, kabiena bishiha bikuabo, Hashishe mu dituku adi Lutonga lua ku miji ya Yishai neluimane bialu bu dibendela dia kusangishaku bisamba bia bantu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Umubikile
Bualu bua binuakudimuna mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa kabidi, bakuenu ne bana benu balela nebahete luse ku mesu kua bantu bakaya n abo mu buhika, nebahingane ku buloba ebu kabidi; bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi wenu udi mûle tente ne luse ne dinanga, kena unukoma nyima binuahingana kudiye
Bena tshisamba etshi bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bimpe mushete wa ndondu, mesa a tshijila, tshitekelu tshia miendu, bilambuilu, malongu adibu benza nawu mudimu muaba wa tshijila, kabidi ne tshilamba tshidibu balembeleja munda mua nzubu wa tshijila
Davidi Wakenza muakamuambila Nzambi; bakashiha musumba wa Bena Peleshete ku Gibeona tô ne ku Gezê
Kadi Yesu wakamukonka ne, Mulumiana, wakunteka meme mulumbuludi wenu ne munutahuluidi nganyi
Kadi pavuadi dibanda kulu, bena Izrayele kubanga luendu musangu umue
Bakatendelela Nzambi bambe ne, Wewe, Mukelenge, ngudi mumanye mitshima ya bantu bonso, utuleshe wa babidi aba umue uwakusungula, bua kuangateye muaba mu mudimu eu ne mu bupostolo muakahonena Yudasa bua kuyeye ku muaba wandi muine
Mu tshikondo atshi masalayi a mukelenge wa Babulona akadi atshintshimika Yelushalema, ne bakamana kubuesha muprofete Yelemiya mu lukanu luakadi mu tshiendelu tshia bansentedi tshia mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa Yuda
Kukebi mukashi
Nuakunvua bihendu bidiye uhenda n abi Nzambi; nudi nuamba tshinyi
Kalongo ka kumpala : Bidi bitangila bampulushi ba ditunga dijima Kanungu ka Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima badi babimikila dikuba dia bantu bônso, dikuba dia bantu ne bintu biabo, dilaminyina ne dipingaja dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso pamwe ne dilama pabwipi dia bamfumu banene
Paulo wakamba ne, Nasha ne kalu kakese nasha ne bualu bunene, ndi ndomba Nzambi kambua wewe nkayebe kadi bua bonso badi bunvua mei anyi lelu kabidi, balue bu mundi emu, anu nkanu ei idishadile

Wadimanyisha
Yeye wakamba ne, Yai, nutangile kudiye, bua meme ntume bantu, balue n andi
Yoshua Buhianyi bua Efelayima ne Manashe Bana ba Yosefe bakangata buhianyi buabo ku Yadene ku Yeleko, ku mai a Yeleko ku esete, ne tshihela tshidi tshijima ku Yeleko tô ne ku mukuna wa ku Betele; mukulu wakafumina ku Betele ku Luze, wakaya ku butshika bua Bena Akâ ku Atalota; wakahueka ku wesete ku mukalu wa Bena Yafelete, ku butshika bua Bete holona udi kumanda tô ne ku Gezê; kunshikidilu kua mukalu kuakadi kukala kua mai manene
Mose wakangata kana ka ngombe kakenzabo, wakakosha mu kahia, wakakabotesha, wakakela mu mai, wakanuisha Bena Isalele mai au
Bualu bua Nzambi wakabuesha bualu ebu mu mitshima yabo bua kuenzabo mudiye wela meshi, ne bua kuikalabo ne meshi amue, ne bua kufilabo bukelenge buabo kudi nyama wa luonji tô ne hashika mei a Nzambi
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kulubulula miakulu yônso eyi kakuyi kansungansunga

Bualu bua bobo bakenza bitendelelu ne makunshi a kutendelela ne Bashela ha mutu ha mikuna yonso ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi yonso; bena Sodoma kabidi bakadi mu buloba; bobo bakenza malu onso a bundu akenza bisamba abi biakadi Yehowa muihate ku mesu kua Bena Isalele
Hezikiya wakunvua mei a bantu aba, wakabalesha bintu bionso bia mu bibutshilu biandi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe ne manyi a mushinga mukole ne nsubu wa bintu biandi bia nvita ne bintu bionso biakadiye n abi; Hezikiya kakabenga bua kubalesha bintu bionso bia mu nsubu wandi ne mu bukelenge buandi
Abu wewe, udi ulumbuluisha muan enu bua tshinyi

Yehowa wakunvua mei enu, wakadi n enu tshiji, wakaditshiha ne, Nansha muntu umue wa mu tshikondo etshi tshibi neatangile buloba ebu buimpe, bunakalaya batatu enu bua kunuhabu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, neabutangile; nemmuhe buloba buakadiateye muinshi mua makasa andi, ne kudi bana bandi, bualu bua yeye wakalonda Yehowa bulelela
Matuku awu kanuenji midimu mikuabu to, anu ya kulamba biakudia

MUTU WA MUKANDA VIII: Bidi bitangila ditangilula dia Dîyi dikulu
Bana benu kabena mua kuya ku mvita nkayabu to
Bua bufuba musaka wa nsubu udi uhuka; bua lulengu mai adi amata mu nsubu
Ke munudi mua kujikija buenzayi munkatshi muenu nanku
Nunyange mpingu yonsu, idi ileja mvidie yabu, nansha bayisonge mu mabue, nansha bayifule ne tshiamu
Kulondakajabu Yakobe mu njila matuku muanda mutekete
Malu a bundu adi ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele benza munemu, adi angihata ku nsubu wanyi wa tshijila, udi umona mene, anyi
Yeye wakatshiolola; tshiakadi tshiakane kabidi bu tshinga tshianza
Kutulabu kabidi bisosa ne mashinda bua kutudisha
Kanungu ka Bibambalu biônso bibidi bidi bitwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene pa mianda eyi: a lwendu lwa kulonda mu diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila tunungu twa too ne ku twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; b dianyisha dia diludika ne dikuba dia ditunga pa lukasa kudi bilwilu ne dieelangana dia mvita bilondeshila tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; c diteeleja dia muyuki wa Mulombodi wa ditunga pa ngikadilu wa mianda ya Ditunga bilondeshila kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi ; d diteeka dia bantu basatu beena Kabadi komekela mianda ya Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi
Yakoba wakunvua lumu ne, Yeye wakamana kunyanga muan andi mukashi Dina
Yeye neavuishe dibutuka didi ditamba bukole, neatute dikasa dimpe mu malu mabi adiye wenza neabutule bantu badi ne bukole ne bantu ba bansanto diatshimue
Bakelenge aba batanu bakanyema, bakasokoma mu lubuebue lua ku Makeda

Bayidi bandi bakamukonka ne, Mu muaba eu wa tshihela netuhete mitanda ya bidia ya bungi ya kûkutshisha bantu bungi nunku kudi kunyi
Mu bualu ebu kabidi badi bakeba munkatshi mua balami bua kusangana mulami yonso muikale muntu udibo mua kueyemena
Yeye kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu
Bena Benyamina bakahingana ku tshikondo atshi; bakabaha bakashi bakakuatabo ne muoyo ku Yabesha gilada; kadi kabakabakumbana
Mose ne Eleazâ bakabambila mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne mai a Yadene batangilangane ne Yeleko ne, Nubale bungi bua bantu ba mu bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Bena Isalele bakaluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Edi ndî diakuamba Yehowa ne, Makelela udi dituku dia kuikisha dia tshijila, dituku diakadijidila Yehowa nulambe bidia ne munyinyi binudi basue, ne bintu bionso bidi bishala, nubitekele bua kudia makelela
Bintu bia argent bidi bianyi, bintu bia or bidi bianyi
Mose ne Alona bakaya kudi Palô, bakamuambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, udi Wamba ne
Tangila, wewe wakuyisha bantu ba bungi, Mei ebe akubisha muntu wakadi wamba kudishinda, Kadi mpindiu bualu ebu budi bukukuata, mutshima webe udi unema bujitu; Kutshina kuebe kua Nzambi kakuena tshieyemenu tshiebe, anyi
Mu muanda eu mudi dinanga, kembua tuetu tuakunanga Nzambi, kadi bua yeye wakatunanga, wakatuma Muana wandi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au mibi yetu
Yosefe wakatuma bana babo nunku, bakaya yeye wakabambila ne, Nudimuke, kanutandanganyi mu nshila
diteeka dia beena mudimu wa manga bilondeshila mukanda mulongolodi wa ngikadilu wa beena mudimu bashindame ba mbulamatadi; dienza dia ndongamu ya dikomba ne dilwisha dia masama a tshibidilu ne a tshiâmbu bilondeshila ndongamu wa ditunga: bulongolodi bwa midimu ya mankenda ne ya didimwija bantu ku masama mu polovensa; dilonda ne ditangila dia mêyi adi aludika midimu ya bondopi ne ya manga mu ditunga pamwe ne bulongolodi bwa midimu ya londapu, bwa midimu ya diambulwisha bantu ne ya batumibwa, ya biâpu bia mianda ya londapu ne bwa midimu ya manga, dilongolola ne divudija dia londapu lwa nzanzanza;
Hakadiye uya mu nshila, bantu bandi bakasangila n andi, bakamuambila ne, Muan ebe udi ne muoyo
Yeye wakabambila bikole ne, Tangilai bimpe, nudimukile luevene lua Bafalese ne lua Helode
ditambakana, bintu bia kale, dibandila dia bantu bônso ne mpangu ya nyama idi ne diambulwisha mu polovensa ne mu musoko
Elemu mafuta, atekepu ne musenga wa kamonya, bualu mmulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi
Mukelenge Yehowa wakafila Yehoyakima, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu bianza biandi, ne tshituha tshia malonga ne mpanza bia mu nsubu wa Nzambi; yeye wakaya n abi mu buloba bua Shinâ mu nsubu wa nzambi wandi
Bualu ebu budi bu muwakumona, dibue diakulamuka ku mukuna, tshianza tshia muntu katshiyi tshi dilenga, diakutshibula tshiamu tshifike, tshiamu tshia mitaku, dima, argent ne or

Mukelenge wa mu Samalea neabutudibue Bitendelelu bia ha mukuna wa Awena nebibutudibue, Ku matuku a ku Gibea tô ne mpindiu, nuenu Bena Isalele nuakuenza bibi; Hanasua kubakengesha, nembakengeshe; Bena Efelayima bakadi bu lukungulu lua ngombe luakuyishabo, Nudikunyine buakane, Nunkukuna malu mabi, Nunku diyoyo nedijuke munkatshi mua bana benu, Nuenu Bena Isalele, nebanuenzele nunku Hoshea Hakadi Bena Isalele bana, nakabananga, Kadi hanakananukila kubabikila, Kadi meme nguakayisha Bena Efelayima mua kuendabo; Nakabakoka ne mionshi idibo bakoka n ai muntu, Kabena bahingana mu buloba bua Ejipitu; Muele wa nvita neufike mu misoko yabo, Bantu banyi badi basue anu kuntombokela; Bena Efelayima, ndi mua kunulekela munyi
Balaame udi wela bena Izrayele lupemba Butshia dinda, Balake kuya ne Balaame ku Bamote Baale, bualu muaba awu uvua mua kudimuena tshitupa tshia bena Izrayele
Nenku ke mikenji ivua Maweja Nangila mumanyishe Moshe pa mukuna wa Sinayi, bua ambile bena Izrayele
Nunku, bualu bua tuetu tudi tuangata bukelenge budi kabui bumanye mua kuzakashibua, tuikale bietu ne disakidila, ditudi bamanye mua kukuatshila Nzambi udi unsankisha mudimu ne kunemekela ne ditshina; bualu bua Nzambi wetu udi kahia kadi kashidisha

Wakalua ne mulambu wa bantu, wakangata mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila bubi bua bantu, wakamushiha, wakamufila bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, bu muakenzeye mulambu wa diambedi
Bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mumane kubamanyisha ne: nenuluile bonsu mu tshipela

Ndi musue kusombuela baluishi banyi, kufuta bonsu badi bankina

Hakahingana Yesu, bantu ba bungi bakamusankidila, bualu bua bakadi bamuindile

Tshiena nubikila kabidi bahika; bualu bua muhika kena mumanye budi mukelenge wandi wenza; kadi nakunubikila balunda; bualu bua nakunumanyisha malu onso anakunvua kudi Tatu wanyi
Nyuma wa Yehowa wakamutulukila bikole, ne yeye wakamuhanda, bu muakadiye mua kubanda kana ka mbushi; yeye kakadi ne tshintu mu tshianza tshiandi; yeye kakambila tatu wandi anyi mamu wandi bualu buakenzeye

Kuenzabu nkanu ya bijengu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi bua kubuejamu mitshi ayi

Nenganyishe mupuya muimpe wawu

Wansulula ku mubidi wa lufu elu, nganyi

Mpindiewu ndi muimane ku mpokolu wa mayi

Yai nutangile

Beena Bilo badi babasungula mu mushindu udibo balongolola kudi mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu

Amen
Hashishe, ya kudi badi mu buhika, kudi bana benu ba mu tshisamba tshiebe, akula n abo, ubambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba dî edi, nansha biasuabo kunvua nansha biabengabo kunvua
Yuda wakamba ne, Yeye ashale n atshi, bua bundu kabutukuatshi, mona, nakamutumina muana wa mbushi eu, ne wewe kuakamusangana
Bana ba batuadi ba bintu: bana ba Shaluma ne ba Atê ne ba Talemona ne ba Akuba ne ba Hatita ne ba Shobai, buonso buabo bakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne tshitema
Ku nyima kuabo Azaya, muana wa Mâseya, muana wa Ananiya, wakalongolola ku luseke lua nsubu wandi
Muhika wakamukudimuna dî ne, Nyeye mukelenge wanyi Lebeka wakangata tshilulu tshikudika, wakatshiteka ku mishiku yandi
Bua mu matuku enu, nuenu ba mu diku dia bantombokedi, nengambe dî dianyi, nendimane; â mmei adi Mukelenge Yehowa wamba
Mu muaba wawa neyilale mu luhangu luimpe, ne neyidie mashinde mu madimi a mashinde mimpe ha mikuna ya mu Isalele
Maweja Nangila uvua wenza bionsu ebi, bualu uvua unanga bankambua benu
Bualu kai nudi basue kufua, nuenu Bena Isalele
Bu mutuakatuala tshifuanyikishi tshia wakafukibua ne dinfuenkenya, neatuale kabidi tshifuanyikishi tshia wa mu diulu
Bule buawu buikale bua metre umue
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, bantu aba bakujadika mpingu yabo mu mitshima yabo, bakuteka tshilenduishi tshia kudibuesha mu bubi ku mpala kuabo; ngunvue kulomba kuabo, anyi
Nyeye utudi tuamba, tudimusha muntu yonso ne tuyisha muntu yonso mu meshi onso, bua tuetu tumanye mua kumuenesha muntu yonso muakane tshishiki mu Kilisto
Wakakudimana ha bulalu buandi, wakatangisha mpala wandi ku tshimanu, kakadia tshintu
Kumonaye Izake banaya ne mukajende Rebeka
Bubi buebe budi mua kukengesha muntu bu wewe, Bualu bua makengesha mavule adi alua kudibo, bakuabo badi badila; Kadi kakuena umue udi wamba ne, Nzambi Mufuki wanyi udi kudi kunyi

Yehowa, Nzambi mene wa misumba, udi wamba dî edi
Biakudia bienu nebiume ne munanga; nansha nebibole
Bualu bua ndi nuambila ne, Budibo n abu mbua kushikisha kundi di edi didi difunda ne, Bakamubala hohamue ne bantu babi; bualu bua nebashikishe mei onso akafundabo bualu buanyi
Munkatshi mua bantu aba bonso muakadi bantu nkama muanda mutekete hasungula bakadi ne luboko; muntu yonso wakadi mumanye mua kuela mabue mu disoka, kâyi eku ne eku bu ntanta wa bunene bua lusuki, kayi uhanga
Budi bulua ne bintu bia bungi kudi bakelenge bawakateka ku mutu kuetu bua malu mabi etu; bobo badi ne bukokeshi bua mibidi yetu ne bua bimuna bietu, bu mudi disua diabo, ne tuetu tudi mu dikenga dikole

Wewe Yehowa, udi ha buihi; Katshia matuku mahite kele mikenji yebe idi ilesha bu mûdi yakammanyisha ne, Umone dikenga dianyi, umpandishemu, Ungakuile tshilumbu tshianyi, umpikule; Luhandu ludi kule ne bantu babi, Luse luebe ludi lunene, Yehowa, Bakengeshi banyi ne badi n anyi lukuna badi ba bungi, Nakatangila batungidi ba tshitungu, malu abo akantonda, Elangana meji bu mundi munange mei audi ungambila

Nuenu badi badisonsuela lukuka lua masandi munkatshi mua mitshi ya telebinta, Munkatshi mua mabue a mu tshibanda adi ne busenu mudi luseke luwakusungula; Wakuteka bualu buebe Wakushimika tshivulukidi tshiebe tshia nzambi wa tshianana Wakaya biebe kudi nfumu Moleke Wakadihangisha bualu bua bule bua luendu luebe, Wakutshina nganyi ne nganyi wakunkuatshisha buowa, Nengambile bantu bua buakane buebe ne bua bienzedi biebe, Hawadila, mpingu yebe ya tshianana iwakusangisha ikuhandishe
Mukelenge wakafuma ku tshibunda tshiandi, wakabuela mu nsubu wa kudia kabidi; Hamana wakamana kudiela ha ditanda hakadi Esetê
Nunku mukelenge ne Bena Isalele bonso bakajidila nsubu wa Yehowa
Tshiakudia tshiebe neutshipete anu pawenza mudimu mukole matuku onsu audi ne muoyi pa buloba
Hakambeye kufua, bakashi bakadi bimana ha buihi n andi bakamuambila ne, Kutshinyi, bualu bua wewe wakulela muana wa balume

Balumbuluishi Muena Lewi ne Mukashi Wandi wa Masandi Mu matuku au hakadibo kabayi ne mukelenge mu Isalele, Muena Lewi mukuabo wakadi mushikame ku nyima kua mikuna ya Efelayima, wakadiangatshila mukashi muhika wa mu Beteleheme yuda
Bualu bukuabo, usungule munkatshi mua bantu bonso balume badi ne lungenyi lule, badi batshina Nzambi, bena bulelela, badi bakina mbueshilu, ubateke ku mutu kua bantu bu bakokeshi ba bantu tshinunu ne ba bantu lukama ne ba bantu makumi atanu ne ba bantu dikumi
Ke munudi mua kulomba, munudi mua kunemeka kashidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Hadada wa kafua, ne Samala wa ku Maseleka, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Bualu bua muntu udi wenza bualu bubi neangate kabidi bualu bubi buakenzeye bu difutu diandi; ne kakuena kansungunsungu kudi Nzambi
Yoshua wakadi muimane ku mpala kua muanjelo mulale bivualu bia bukoya
Wakamba ne, Yehowa, ndi nkusengelela ne, Uvuluke munakuenda ku mpala kuebe mu bushuwa ne mu buakane bua mutshima, ne munakuenza malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kuebe
Nuenu bahika, tumikilai dî dia badi banfumu benu ba mu malu a ha buloba ne kutshina ne kuzakala ne mutshima umue, bu munudi nutumikila Kilisto
Udi unanga bantu benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ubapesha bilamba ne biakudia
Kadi nkadi mukuenzele nenku musangu mukuabu anyi
Nakukutumbisha ha buloba, nakushikisha mudimu uwakumpa
Bikaleye mubaka kudi mulume hatshidiye ne kuditshiha kuandi anyi mei makuabo akaditshiheye n au ne biunvua mulume wandi ne biahuweye mu dituku diakunveye kuditshiha kuandi, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebijalame
Bena mudimu ba Shaula bakamuambila ne, Tangila, nyuma mubi kudi Nzambi udi ukutatshisha
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete
Muaba awu, mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kumuenekela Moshe mu ndimi ya kapia munkatshi mua tshipuka
Ne badi bela di dikole, bamba ne, Ne banjelo bonso bakadi bimana banyunguluka nkuasa wa butumbi, ne bakulu ne bifukibue binai bidi ne muoyo; ne bakahona ku mpala kua nkuasa wa butumbi ha mpala habo, ne bakatendelela Nzambi, bamba ne, Ne umue wa bakulu wakangandamuna dî ungambila ne, Aba badi baluatshisha ne mayeka matoke badi banganyi ne bakafuma kudi kunyi
Tshiakadila bualu bua muntu mukuabo wakadi mu dikenga, anyi

Bena Amona bakadisangisha ku misoko yabo yonso bua kuluanganabo
Hakayai bua kusumba manyi, mubaki wa mukashi wakalua; yakadi ne bintu biai bilongolola yakabuela n andi ku disanka dia dibanji; bakinshila tshibi

Binuikala kanui nuitabusha malu akafundeye, nenuitabushe mei anyi munyi

Neatuute bena Mowabe dikombu ku mbanga

Ebu bualu buakenza bantu aba banene basatu

Bu mudi bungi bua matuku awalala, mbu mudi bungi bua matuku awatuala mibi yabo
Bakaya mu madimi, bakahuola mamuma abo, bakatua tumuma tuabo tua nvinyo ku makasa abo, bakadia bidia bia disanka, bakabuela mu nsubu wa nzambi wabo, bakadia, bakanua, bakela Abimeleke mulau

Akisha wakamba ne, Wakuhaula bena nganyi lelu eu

Nutulombele Nzambi; bua tudi tuitabushishibua ne tudi ne mioyomikese mimpe, tudi basue kuenda bimpe mu malu onso

Tshiena mumanye mua kuowamu mai, ngikale muakane, anyi

Bana aba ke ndelanganyi yonsu ya Ketura
Ke tuetu kupingana kuetu, kulondela tatu, muntu webe, malu onsu auvua muambe
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, ambila bantu mei a buprofete buebe, ubambile ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, udi musekeshibue bua kushiha n au bantu, Badi baufila bua kûnonabo, bua baukuate mu tshianza; muele wa nvita udi musekeshibue ne munonoke bua bauteke mu tshianza tshia mushihianganyi

Nebayilongeshe kabidi ndelanganyi yabu

Pumvua bena Izrayele binudi bamuenzela, nebatshine

Kadi bikala mulume wandi mumukande mu dituku diakunvueye, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso kabiena bualame, mulume wandi wakavuisha malu au bu malu a hatuhu, Yehowa neamubiukidile bualu abu

Badi bahidia nunku nebadiangatshile dilumbuluisha
Yeye kabidi wakatumina bana ba Isalele dî, wakabambidila lumu luimpe lua ditalala kudi Yesu Kilisto yeye udi Mukelenge wa bantu bonso ; nuenu mene nudi bamanye dî edi, diakutangalashabo mu nseke yonso ya Yudaya dibangila ku Galela ku nyima kua dibatiza diakambabo kudi Yone; nudi bamanye kabidi bualu bua Yesu wa mu Nazaleta bu muakamuela Nzambi Nyuma Muimpe ne bukole; yeye wakendakana wenza malu mimpe, wondaha ukolesha bonso bakadi bakengeshibua kudi diabolo, bua Nzambi wakadi n andi

Bakamba ne, Tudi ne bualu bua bamanyi kabidi kudi kunyi

Kadi mu bualu ebu ndi nuha dijingulula dianyi: ebu mbualu bunudi n abu, nuenu mbakabanga bualu ebu tshidimu tshia ku mpala, kembua kuenza nkayaku, kadi mbua kusua kuenza kabidi

Mamuma mimpe a mu buloba buabo buonso adibo bahuola diambedi, adibo halua n au kudi Yehowa, neikale mamuma ebe, muntu yonso wa mu nsubu webe udi muakane neadie
Bana ba Yola, lukama ne dikumi ne babidi
Mpingu ya mushindu ewu idi ne bua kubutuka yonsu
Moshe udi usengelela Maweja Nangila bua afuile bena Izrayele luse Butshia dinda, Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Nudi benza tshilema tshipite bunene
Yeye kubatuma kudi Yozefe, ubandamuna bonsu ne: Lombayi kudi Yozefe
Bantu aba bonso, bena nvita bakamanya mua kuasa mualu wa nvita, bakatua ne mitshima mitoke ku Hebelone bua kuhingishabo Davidi mu bukelenge bua Isalele mujima; ne bonso bakuabo ba Isalele bakadi ne mutshima umue bua kuhingisha Davidi mu bukelenge
Nunku nutumikile mikenji ne malu ne mei binakunuambila lelu, nubienze
Yeye wakamba ne, Bualu buikale bu mudi mei enu
Nunku budi balume n abu mbua kusua bakashi babo mene bu mudibo basue mibidi yabo
Moshe kubikila Elazare ne Itamare, bana ba balume ba Arone, pamue ne Arone mene
Kadi bua mulambu wa bobumue, nenundambule bana ba mikoku babidi, bakadi ne tshidimu tshijima
Buloba ebu bujima nebushale bu tshikulu, ne bu tshintu tshidi tshikemesha bantu; ba mu bisamba ebi nebakuatshile mukelenge wa Babulona mudimu bidimu makumi muanda mutekete
Yeye wakenza malu mabi onso akenza tatu wandi ku mpala kuandi; mutshima wandi kawakadi muakane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, bu muakadi mutshima wa Davidi, tatu wandi
Bualu kai wewe udi utubala bu nyama
Maweja Nangila kumujadikila ne: Kuena mua kumona mpala wanyi to, bualu muntu kena mua kumona mpala wanyi, kushala kabidi ne muoyi to
Utume bakulu aba bua batentekele ditunga dia bena Kenaane, dindi mpesha bena Izrayele
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
Ndi ngamba bualu ebu, bana betu, ne, Munyinyi ne mashi kabiena bimanye mua kuhiana bukelenge bua Nzambi
Bena mudimu, nudikokeshe kudi bakelenge benu ne ditshina dionso; kenganu kudi badi bimpe ne badi ne buhole, kadi kudi badi ne tshinyangu kabidi
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Ndi Muena Ebelu; ndi ntshina Yehowa, Nzambi wa mu diulu, wakafuka mai manene ne buloba bûme
Itai wakakudimuna mukelenge dî ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mukelenge wanyi ne muoyo, bulelela, mu miaba yonso idi mukelenge wanyi uya, nansha mu muaba wa lufu nansha mu muaba wa muoyo, muntu wandi neikaleku kabidi
Nanku pavua Rakele ulela muana ukenga bikole, muleleshi kumuambila ne: Kutshinyi to
Kadi bakatangila Palô ne, Bualu buakushika, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, kakabinvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, atumbishibue, yeye kakumushila mukelenge wanyi luse luandi ne bulelela buandi, hanakadi mu nshila Yehowa wakandombola ku nsubu wa bana babo ne mukelenge wanyi
Bana betu, tudi tunusengelela ne, Nudimushe batshimbakanyi, nukoleshe badi ne mitshima yamba kuhanga, nukuatshishe badi batekete, nuikale ne lutulu kudi bantu bonso
Kadi kanuakuteleja matshu enu kundi, kanuakungunvuila
Miehu mikese yakamina miehu yakadi miakane
Diambedi yeye wakadi bu tshintu tshidi katshi tshilubuluka kûdi, kadi katataka udi bu tshintu tshidi tshilubuluka kûdi wewe ne kundi meme kabidi; nakamuhingisha kûdi, yeye muine, udi bu mutshima wanyi mene
Nenufunde ha mabue au mei onso a mikenji ne kufunda kuakane
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Wakenza tshibuikilu tshia tshiamu tshia or nkayandi, buludi buatshi buakadi coudées ibidi ne tshituha, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha
Nudi bamanye bimpe ne: bakaji ba bena Madiyane aba ke bavua bitabe meji a Balaame, bafikishe bena Izrayele ku ditombokela Maweja Nangila, bua kutendelela anu mvidie wa ku Peyore
Tshituha tshia tshioshelu tshia muinshi mua matshua tshikale bunene bumue ne nseke yatshi inai, coudées dikumi ne mai mu bule buatshi ne coudées dikumi ne inai mu butshiama buatshi; tshikale ne muhimbu bunene bua tshituha tshia coudée munyunguluke nseke yatshi inai
Yeye wakabambila ne, Dimukai bua bualu bunudi nunyua; nebanuidikishile bintu ne luidi lunudi nubidikishila n alu kabidi; nebanuhe binga bintu ba mutu
Kadi mukuabu ukadi mumane kufua
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Dituku dia matuku dikumi a ngondo eu wa muanda mutekete ndituku dia kubuikila bubi bua bantu, nebikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, nenufile mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Wakenza bualu bubi ne, Udi ukumina mukuenu tshinyi
Muntu au wakambila Yoaba ne, Nansha wewe mumpe binunu dikumi bia argent mu tshianza tshianyi, tshiakadi kulenga tshianza tshianyi ham bidi ha muana wa mukelenge; bualu bua mukelenge wakanuambila ne Abishai ne Itai mu matshu etu ne, Dimukai, kanulengi nsongalume Abashaloma tshianza
Esawu uvua udila amu kudila
Kadi ba bidime bakamukuma, bakamuhingisha hatuhu
Bualu bua bituitabusha ne Yesu wakafua, ne wakabika ku lufu kabidi, muomumue Nzambi nealue ne bantu aba n andi kabidi bakalala tulu ma lufu bualu bua Yesu
Udishimikile bimanyishilu bia nshila, Wewe muana mukashi wakunkoma nyima, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Hanabumusha mu buhika bua kubaha diakalengele, nebambe mei â mu buloba ne mu misoko ya mu Yuda ne, Yehowa akusankishe, wewe nsubu wa buakane, wewe mukuna wa tshijila
Wakaya n anyi mu Nyuma ku mukuna mimene ne mule, wakandesha musoko wa tshijila, Yelushalema, uhueka hanshi, uluhuka mu diulu kudi Nzambi, muikale ne butumbi bua Nzambi; ne dinkenka diau diakafuana dibue dia mushinga mutambe bukole, bu dibue dia yasape, ditoke tô bu ntalatala
Bakadi bamubala n etu, wakadi mumane kuangata luandi luseke lua mudimu eu
Danyele eu wakatamba ba gouverneur bakuabo ne miloho kutumba, bualu bua lungenyi luakadi luhita bule munda muandi; mukelenge wakelangana meji bua kumuteka ku mutu kua bukelenge buandi buonso
Nakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku
Wakaya, wakatshintshimika musoko wa Samalea bua kûluisha
Bualu bua Bena Peleshete bakalua kuluangana n anyi ne Nzambi wakandekela, kena muitabe kundi kabidi nansha kudi baprofete nansha ku bilota: nunku nakukubikila bua wewe kummanyisha tshindi mua kuenza
Luka, nganga buka munanga, ne Dema badi banutumina muoyo
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Tabala, ditabusha diebe diakukusungila

Mukelenge wakamba ne, Bialueye nkayandi, udi ne lumu mukana muandi
Aba mbana balume ba Efelayima ku meku abo Shutela ne meku a Bena Shutela, Bekê ne meku a Bena Bekê; Tahana ne meku a Bena Tahana
Budi butamba buimpe bua nuenu nuitabushe banunyenge bintu, nasha
Moshe udi usengelela Maweja Nangila bua afuile bena Izrayele luse Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi muenzele bantu aba bishima bia bungi bua kubaleja bukole buanyi
Yeye wakabambila nunku, bualu bua bobo bakamba ne, Yeye udi ne nyuma wa bukoya munda
Bualu bua muntu wa kua bende udi kayi wa munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, hafumeye mu buloba bua kule bua dina diebe bualu bua bobo nebunvue lumu lua dina diebe dinene, ne lua tshianza tshiebe tshikole ne lua diboko diebe dilulame , halueye bua kukutendelela ku nsubu eu, umunvuile mu diulu kûdi ushikama, wenzele muntu wa bende malu onso adiye ukulomba; bua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bamanye dina diebe, bua kukutshina bu mudi bantu bebe Bena Isalele benze; bamanye kabidi ne dina diebe didi dibikidibue ku nsubu eu unakukuashila
Nunku wakabiteka ku mpala kuabo, bakadia ne bintu biakashala bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa

bukookeshi, bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Njila mwitanu : Bidi bitangila Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu Kanungu ka Kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu

Lomo Nunku netuimbe ne, Abalahama, nkambua wetu, wakasangana tshinyi bua mubidi wandi

diteeka dia difutu dia muntu wa kwinshi mu polovensa bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga;

Yeye wakalekela Mose
Nanku, malaba pa diba edi, nendokeshe mvula mukole wa mabue, udi kayi muanji kuloka mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu too ne mpindiewu
Balumbuluishi Bena Efelayima bakadisangisha hamue, bakaya ku luseke lua ku node; bakambila Yefeta ne, Wewe wakasabuka bua kuluangana ne Bena Amona, kuakatubikila bua tuetu kuya n ebe bualu kai
Nakatangila bu mai manene a ntalatala masangisha ne kahia; ne nakatangila badi bahita nyama wa luonji, ne tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, ne nomba wa dina diandi bukole, bimane biabo ha mai manene a ntalatala, bikale ne nkombe ya Nzambi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uye biebe ku mpala kua bantu, ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele baye n ebe, angata mulangala webe mu tshianza, uwakakuma n au musulu, ya biebe
Yelemiya wakakonka mukelenge Sedekiya kabidi ne, Nakukuenzela bualu bubi kai, nakuenzela bena mudimu bebe anyi bantu aba bubi kai, bua nuakumbuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu
Hakunvabo dî dia mukelenge, bakaya biabo; mutoto wakamonabo ku esete wakaya ku mpala kuabo tô ne hakimanau ha buludi hakadi muana, Hakamonabo mutoto, bakatamba kusanka
Davidi wakambila Shaula ne, Muntu webe wakadi ulama mikoko ya tatu wandi: ne hakaha nansha nyama wa ntambue nansha nkashama bua kukuata muana wa mukoko, nakamulonda, nakamushiha, nakasungila muana wa mukoko mukana muandi; hakabikeye bua kunduisha, meme nakamukuata ku buoya buandi, nakamutaha, nakamushiha
Mvua nkenga bikole, munya ungosha matuku onsu
Nuelangane muoyo ne kutuangana kua mishiku kua dinanga
Mbua neyidie muntu yonso wa mu nsubu wa Bâsha udi ufuila mu musoko; ne nyunyu ya mulu neyizokole muntu yonso wa mu nsubu wandi udi ufuila mu tshisuku
Nusombeshangane ne misambu ya bena kuitabusha ba bale ne ya bena Kilisto ne ya Nyuma; nuimbile Mukelenge misambu, numutumbishe ne biombelu bia mitshima yenu
Uvua mutukonke musangu wa kumpala ne: Nudi ne tatuenu, nansha muanenu wa balume mukuabu anyi
Umukankamike, bualu yeye ke wafikisha bena Izrayele mu ditunga edi
Dibue dikuabo diakadi ku node ku mpala kua Mikemasha, ne dinga dibue diakadi ku sude ku mpala kua Geba
Bana balume bakuabo ba Lewi: ba bana ba Amalama, Shubaele; ba bana ba Shubaele, Yedeya
Hashishe Yolama wakahitshila ku Saî ne makalu andi onso; bakabika butuku, bakashiha Bena Edome bakadi babanyunguluka ne tupitene tua makalu; bantu bakanyema ku ntenta yabo
Abimeleke wakaluangana ne bena musoko dituku adi dionso, wakanyenga musoko, wakashiha bantu bonso bakadimu
Nunku muntu eu wakangata malu â onso kudi kunyi
Udi mumanye ne, Muoyo wa muntu udi ubanda kulu, anyi muoyo wa nyama udi uhueka muinshi mua buloba nganyi

Mbuji wa mpumbu umue bua mulambu wa dikobolola bantu
Tshidimu tshiavua, ngondu wa momumue, nempingane apa
Ka, mona buimpe ne mutshima mukole bia Nzambi, mutshima mukole kudi bakahona, ne buimpe bua Nzambi kudi wewe, biwananukila mu buimpe buandi; kadi biwahanga kunanukila, wewe neukoshibue kabidi
Nunku yeye wakamuidika dana ne, Gada
Hautshidi uya ne udi n ebe lukuna kudi mukelenge, mu nshila mene umusengelele bikole akulekele; biwikala kui wenza nunku, yeye neakukoke kudi mulumbuludi, mulumbuludi neakufile mu bianza bia mpolushe, mpolushe nenkuele mu nsubu wa lukanu
Umuambile ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Ebrewu, mmuntume kuudi bua wanyishe bena Izrayele baye mu tshipela bua kuntendelela
Kadi mona, wewe neulele muana wa balume, neikale muena ditalala; nemmuhe ditalala kudi bena lukuna bonso badi bamunyunguluke; bualu bua dina diandi nedikale Solomo; nenvuishe ditalala ne dikisha mu buloba bua Isalele mu matuku andi
Newikale bu lukunyi mu kahia; mashi ebe neamate mu buloba; kabena bakuvuluka kabidi; bualu bua meme, Yehowa, nakuamba nunku
Uvuluke Abalahama ne Isaka ne Isalele, bantu bebe, bawakaditshiha kudibo, wakabambila ne, Nenvudishe bana benu bu bungi bua mitoto ya mulu, ne buloba ebu buonso bunakanuambila nempe bana benu, bobo nebabuhiane tshiendelele
Hakamona Bena Isalele bonso ne, Mukelenge kena witabusha dî dietu, bobo bakebesha mukelenge ne, Tuetu tudi ne luseke luetu lua bintu mu Davidi kudi kunyi

Makire kulela Ngilaade
Bana ba balume ba Zelubabela: Meshulama ne Hananiya; Shelomita wakadi muan abo wa bakashi , Hashuba ne Ohela ne Belekiya ne Hasadeya ne Yushaba heseda, buonso buabo batanu

Nunku Yona wakatamba kusanka bua mudiantondo

Nanku ndi nkutumina diyi ne: umulekele, aye kuntendelela

Davidi wakambila Mikala ne, Nakenza nunku ku mpala kua Yehowa wakansungula ku mpala kua tatu wanyi ne kua bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, wakanteka mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu ba Yehowa, Bena Isalele mene

Nunku badi babikila matuku a ne, Pulima, bu mudi dina dia Pû, Nunku bua mei onso akatuabo mu mukanda eu, ne bua malu onso akatangilabo ku mesu ne bua malu onso akadi abakuata, Bena Yuda bakahunga dî diabo bualu buabo ne bua bana babo baledibue ne bua bantu bonso bakalamata kudibo ne, Tuetu katuena tuhanga kuvuluka matuku â abidi bu muakafundabo, ne mu tshikondo tshiakasungulabo, ku tshidimu ku uhidimu; netuvuluke matuku â ne netualame ku bikondo bionso kudi ba mu meku onso ne ba ku nseke yonso ne ba mu misoko yonso; matuku â a Pulima kaena mua kuhanga munkatshi mua Bena Yuda nansha kuvuluka kuau kudi tunkanunuina tuabo tshiendelele

Ndi nkusengelela ne, Kubusokoki
Ke Nzambi kabidi wakabafila ku bukoya kudi nkuka ya mitshima yabo, bua kunyanganganabo mibidi yabo ne malu a bundu munkatshi muabo; bualu bua bakandamuna bushua bua Nzambi ku mashimi, ne bakatendelela tshintu tshifukibua ne bakatshikuatshishila mudimu ku mpala kua Mufuki watshi; udi biandi mutumbishibue tshiendelele

Hashishe, badi bahita mu nshila bu luhehele, Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, wewe kuena wanyi Wa Tshijila Wewe udi ne mesu mahite buakane adi kâyi mua kutangila malu mabi, Wewe udi uvuisha bantu bu minyinyi ya mu mai manene, Yeye udi ukuata buonso buabo ne ndobo; Bua malu â yeye udi ushihela kahamba kandi milambu, Yeye neananukile kuhumuna kahamba kandi tshiendelele Habakuka Nengimane ha tshibumba tshianyi tshia butentekedi, Hashishe, Yehowa wakangitaba ne, Funda tshikena kumona Bualu bua tshikena kumona etshi ntshia tshikondo Monai, mutshima wa udi udibandisha kawena muakane munda muandi; Bualu bua dikuatshika diandi dia maluvu didi dimuvuisha umena dikamakama, Bantu aba kabena bamubingila tshibingu, anyi

Ditshina dia Nzambi kadiena ku mesu kuabo
Nunku Yehowa udi Wamba bualu bua mukelenge wa Ashû ne, Yeye kena ufika ha buihi ne musoko eu, kena welaku mukete umue, kena umueneka ku mpala kuau ne ngabu wandi, kena wela mushiki wa buloba ku musoko eu
Muntu yonso udi ne lungenyi lule alue biandi bua kuenza bi ntu bionso biakunuambila Yehowa ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu, ne nkanu yatshi ne mabaya atshi, ne mitshi yatshi ne makurishi atshi ne nkanu ya ku makunshi, ne mushete ne mitshi ya mushete, ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete, ne tshilulu tshia munkatshi mua tshitendelelu, ne mesa ne mitshi ya mesa ne malonga a mesa ne bidia bia ha mesa, ne tshitekelu tshia minda ne malonga atshi ne minda yatshi, ne manyi a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne mitshi yatshi, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne manananshi adi atua dihembu dimpe, ne tshilulu tshia ha mbelu ha tshitendelelu, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne bintu bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mitshi yatshi ne malonga atshi, ne tshiowelu ne mesa atshi, ne bilulu bia ku luhangu ne makunshi a luhangu, ne nkanu ya ku makunshi ne tshilulu tshia ha mbelu ha luhangu, ne milondo ya mu tshitendelelu ne ya mu luhangu ne nshinga yai, ne bilulu bia mushinga mukole bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu muaba wa tshijila, bilulu bia tshijila bia muakuidi

Balaame kuamba ne: To
Bua kanuakuangata nyuma wa buhika tshiakabidi bua kutshina; kadi nuakuangata nyuma wa buhianyi bua bana utudi tubikila n andi Nzambi ne, Aba, Nyuma Muimpe muine udi mumanyishangane ne nyuma yetu ne, Tuetu tudi bana ba Nzambi

Wewe Yehowa Nzambi nguakasungula Abalama, nguakafuma n andi mu buloba bua Ula wa Bena Kasada, wakamuidika dina dia Abalahama; wewe wakamusangana ne mutshima wa kukueyemena, wakahunga n andi tshihungidi bua kumuha buloba bua Bena Kanâna, bua Bena Hiti, bua Bena Amole, bua Bena Pelese, bua Bena Yebuse ne bua Bena Gîgashi, bua kubuha tunkanunuma tuandi; wewe wakenza mei ebe onso, bualu bua wewe udi muakane

Nanku Mvidi Mukulu kumuinyika ne: Izrayele
Mumonyi wa hatuhu udi uhetula kulumbulula kuakane; Bakulongoluela babuidi makengesha, Nsumuinu Nyinyo udi museki wa bantu, maluvu makole adi bu muena diyoyo; Buowa budi mukelenge utshinyisha n abu bantu budi bu muadi wa nyama wa ntambue; Butumbi budi kudi muntu biashilanganeye ne matandu, Muhote kena udima budimi tshikondo tshidi mashika a banga; Meji adi muntu uhangidisha mu mutshima adi bu mai male, Ba bungi badi badiamba ne, Tudi bena luse; Muntu muakane udi wenda mu Mukelenge udi ushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge ukosamu bilumbu udi usungulula Muntu kai udi mua kuamba ne, Majitu a mishindu ibidi ne bihiminu bia mishindu ibidi, Muana mene udi umuenesha tshikadilu tshiandi ku bienzedi biandi, Ditshu didi diunvua ne disu didi ditangila, Kunangi tulu, bua kubuedi mu buhele; Musumbi udi wamba ne, Tshidi tshibi, tshidi tshibi; Or ne mabue a bungi a mushinga mukole bidiku; Angata tshivualu tshia muntu udi mueyeke muenyi tshieya; Bidia bidi muntu uheta ku kudinga kuandi bidi bishemakana mukana muandi, Malu adi bantu bahangidisha adi ajadikibua ku kuhunga kua dî; Udi wendakana wamba buambamba udi usokolola malu masokoka; nunku kubuelakana ne muntu udi wakula Biela muntu tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau, Buhianyi budi muntu uheta lubilu ku tshibangidilu Kuambi ne, Nempingishe bubi ku bubi; Majitu a mishindu ibidi adi atondesha Yehowa; Biendedi bia muntu bidi biendeshibua kudi Yehowa; Budi buteyi kudi muntu bua kuambeye lukasa ne, Tshidi tshia tshijila, Mukelenge udi ne meji udi usungula bantu babi, Nyuma ukebakebe Luse lujalame ne lulamatu lua bushuwa bidi bilama mukelenge; Butumbi bua bansongalume mbukole buabo, Mitutu idi itaha mputa idi ilengesha muntu ku malu mabi; Nsumuinu Mutshima wa mukelenge mu bianza bia Yehowa udi bu misulu ya mai, Nshila yonso udi muntu wendela udi muakane ku mesu kuandi, Kuenza malu makane ne kukosa nsambu biakane Mesu adi ne dihetu ne mutshima udi udibandisha bidi disanka Meji adi muena mutshima wa mudimu uhangidisha adi amuvudishila luhetu luvule, Kuheta tshibutshilu ku ludimi lua mashimi Tshimbambila tshia bantu babi netshibumusheku, Nshila wa muntu mutambe bubi udi mukonyangale, Kushikama ha ditumba dia ha mutu ha nsubu kudi kutamba kushikama Mutshima Hakengeshabo mubuidi, mutshimbakanyi udi uheta meji;
