Neufunde bifuanyikishi bia tumuma tua grenade ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunzekunzû kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso, neuteke ndibu ya or hankatshi ha tumuma, neuteke kadibu ka or ne kamuma, ne kadibu ka or ne kamuma to ne kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso
Hawakeba kusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume, anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi, matshu ebe neunvue dî difume ku nyima kuebe, diamba ne, Nshila kayeu, endelamu
Kabidi meyi ne mikandu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bivua bikandika bua kabasumbishi madimi abu
Labashake wakahingana, wakasangana mukelenge wa Ashû uluangana ne Bena Libena; bualu bua wakamana kunvua ne, Yeye wakumuka ku Lakisha
Hashishe mukelenge wakabika, wakashikama ku tshibi tshia musoko
Hakadibo baya mu nshila wa ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, Yehowa wakasangakena n andi, wakamba kumushiha
Nadaba ne Abihu bakafua ku mpala kua Yehowa, hakaluabo ne kahia kakadi kakayi kajidila ku mpala kua Yehowa, mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bobo kabakadi ne bana, ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ bakenza mudimu wa buakuidi ku mesu kua Alona tatu abo
Sheta wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne bitanu, wakalela Enosha Ku nyima kua kulela kua Enosha, Sheta wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne muanda mutekete, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi Matuku onso a Sheta akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne dikumi ne bibidi, yeye wakafua biandi
Badi baka ma mafuta mu mpangu ya bantu aba; Mu musoko mudi munvuika mikemu ya bantu bafuafua, Aba mbantu badi batombokela munya; Mushihianganyi udi ubika hahatuka diba, Mesu a muena masandi adi indila kajimb a buenyi, Bibi badi batubula nsubu masoso butuku; Bualu bua mundankulu mudi bu dinda kudibo bonso, Bantu babi badi bahueka lubilu, balelema ha mutu ha mai; Munanga ne luya lukole bidi bikamisha mai a ku neige; muomumue, Muaba wa Bafue udi unyenga bantu bakuenza bibi
Masanka Asatu Majalame Ek
Hakadiye welangana meshi a malu â, muanjelo wa Mukelenge wakamueneka kudiye mu tshilota tshiandi, wakamba ne, Yosefe, muana wa Bayidi, kutshinyi mua kuangata mukashi webe Malia, bualu bua udi muimita munda muandi ngua Nyuma Muimpe
Wakateka musambu muhia muhia mukana muanyi, Disanka didi kudi muntu udi uvuisha Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, wakuvudisha malu a kukema awakuenza Wewe Hashishe, nakamba ne, Mona, ndi ndua; ndi ne disanka bua kuenza disua diebe, Nzambi wanyi, Nakuamba lumu luimpe lua buakane buebe mu disangisha dinene dia Tshiakusokoka buakane buebe munda muanyi hawakumbingisha, Yehowa, kunkandidi luse luebe lunene; Bua malu mabi adi kâyi mua kubadibua akunyunguluka; Yehowa, wikale ne disanka bua kumpandisha; Bantu aba bafuishibue bundu ne babuandakashibue, buonso buabo Badi bamba ne, Eyo, eyo
Samuele wakamba ne, Bena Isalele bonso badisangishile ku Misepa, meme nennulombele Yehowa
Davidi ne Bena Isalele bonso bakimba misambu ne bisanji ne nzenze ne nkumbi ne makasa ne mpungi ne bukole buabo buonso
Bana betu, ndi nusengelela ne, Dimukai bua badi bavuisha matahuluka ne malenduisha munkatshi muenu, adi kâi bu diyisha dinuakayila; nubakome nyima
Wakamba biandi ne, Mona
Neunutonde, unupatukila mu diulu
Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Abrahame ne: Kubikidi kabidi mukajebe ne Sarayi to
Kanuena mua kuenza mudimu dituku adi to
Nunku wakaya, wakalala mu muaba wandi
Yesu wakamuangalasha bantu aba dikumi ne babidi, wakalayangana n abo ne, Kanuyi mu nshila wa ku bisamba bia bende, kanubuedi mu musoko wa Bena Samalea; kadi nuye kudi mikoko idi mijimine ya nsubu wa Isalele
Kadi Yehowa kakandamuka ku bukole bua tshiji tshiandi tshikole tshiakadiye n atshi kudi Bena Yuda, bualu bua malu mabi onso akenza Manashe akamufuisheye n au tshiji
Bakenza tshilulu tshia ku mbelu kua luhangu ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin muimpe kudi bantu bakadi ne lungenyi lule bule buatshi buakadi coudées ma kunu abidi ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, muomumue ne bilulu bia luhangu
Tangilai, Muena Atiopa, muntu mutungula wa bukokeshi bunene ku nyima kua Kandake, nfumu mukashi wa Bena Atiopa, muikale ku mutu kua tshibutshilu tshiandi tshionso, wakadi mulue ku Yelushalema bua kutendelela Nzambi; wakadi uhingana mushikame mu dikalu diandi ubala mukunda wa muprofete Yeshaya
Yelemiya Bubi bua ba mu Yuda budi bifundibue ne tshiamu tshia kutaha n atshi maleta ne ku lusongo lua dibue dia diamant; budi butahibue ha dibue dia mu mitshimai yabo ne ha nsengu ya bioshelu biabo
Natana wakambila Davidi bu muakadi mei â onso, ne bu muakadi tshikena kumona etshi
Bualu ngondu awu ke unuvua bapatuke mu Ejipitu
Ikala ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima; kutshinyi, kukuatshiki buowa, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, udi n ebe kuonso kuwaya
Solomo wakalua ne bintu biakajidila Davidi tatu wandi ne argent ne or ne mpanza yonso, wakabiteka mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Wa ku mpala wakadi bu nyama wa ntambue, wakadi ne mahuahua bu nyunyu wa mukanku
Bualu bua nakunuambila malu â, mitshima yenu idi miule tente ne kanyinganyinga
Nunku Yobo wakafua, muntu mununu, matuku andi mule tente ne disanka
Bobo nebatele efoda ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bukunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe, bintu bidibo benzesha kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Shaluma, muana wa Yabesha, wakamuelela tshifufu, wakamukuma ku mesu kua bantu, wakamushiha, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Nunku Yefeta wakafika kudi Bena Amona bua kuluangana n abo, ne Yehowa wakabafila mu tshianza tshiandi
Yozefe kuambila bena ditunga ne: Mpindiewu nuenu bonsu nudi bajadike mundi mumane kunusumba, musumbe kabidi ne madimi enu
Bakambula tshihiminu tshia épha ne bakatshibandisha hankatshi ha diulu ne buloba
Nunku Eli wakambila Samuele ne, Ya ulale: hashishe, biakubikilabo kabidi, wewe umuitabe ne, Yehowa, ambaku, bualu bua muntu webe udi munvue
Yeye wakamba ne, Bakuatai ne muoyo
Di dia Yehowa kudi Mose ne Alona Mose wakahingana kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa, wewe wakenzela bantu aba bibi nunku bualu kai
Samuele Natana Udi Ubela Davidi Yehowa wakatuma Natana kudi Davidi
Yonsu wa kudibu kupingaja bibombi panyima pa mpunde
Yelemiya muprofete wakaya mu nshila wandi
Kadi dilolu, ikale ungoshila manananshi padiye uye kutemesha muendu
Tshiakatshina bua kunuambila malu onso adi Nzambi musue
Mika Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Mika, Muena Molesheta, mu matuku a Yotama, Ahaza ne Hezikiya, bakelenge ba Yuda, bualu bua Samalea ne Yelushalema
Kanutshinyi ku mesu kuabo, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi munene udi uvuisha ditshina dikole
Kadi Bafalese bakuabo bakabakonka ne, Nuenu nudi nuenzela bualu budi bujila dituku dia Lumingu tshinyi
Musumbi wa bintu kasanki biandi, muhanyi wa bintu kâshi madilu, bua tshiji tshikole tshidi tshihona ham bidi ha tshisumbu tshiabo tshionso
Nuenu Bena Isalele, nennulumbuluishe, muntu ne muntu, bu mudi bienzedi biandi
Bualu bua dilobo adi kadiakadi diakane dia kushikishilaku ngondo ya mashika, bakadi batambe bungi bakamba ne, Tumukai kunoko, ne tuamanya mua kufika ku Foinike bua kushikishilaku ngondo ya mashika, aku kudi dilobo dikuabo dia Kulete, didi ditangila ku node esete ne ku sude esete
Hakamona Yesu bantu ba bungi bunguila lukasa, wakabela nyuma wa bukoya, wakamuambila ne, Wewe nyuma wa kamama ne wa mahaha, ndi nku buluila ne, Umuka munda muandi, kubuedimu kabidi
Tshitupa tshibîdi : Bidi bitangila Bweena Ditunga Kanungu ka Bweena ditunga dia Kongu budi bumwe ne bwa mukawu
Bu muvua Maweja Nangila mutshishe butuku abu bua kupatula bantu bende mu Ejipitu, ke mudi bena Izrayele pabu, ku ndelanganyi ne ndelanganyi, mua kutshisha dituku adi bua kuvuluka dipatuka diabu mu Ejipitu, bualu ndituku dia tshijila
Bana ba Bezai nkama isatu ne makumi abidi ne banai
Bituikala badijingulule munda muetu, kabakadi ne bualu bua kulumbuluisha
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia ngulube tshiakadi mu tshibandabanda tshia mukuna, yakadi idia mashinde
Tshiole tshiakashala mu buloba bidimu bibidi, ne bidimu bitanu bidi bishala bidibo kabayi badima, kabayi bahuola bintu
Nansha biandekela tatu wanyi ne mamu wanyi, Yehowa neangambule
Mikenji ya ditendelela ne ya nsombelu mulenga wa bantu Pikala muntu mutombole nsongakaji udibu kabayi banji kusela, afile biuma bua kusela mukaji awu
Nakumûsha tente ne Nyuma wa Nzambi ne lungenyi ne dijingulula ne meji mu kuenza kua midimu yonso ya bianza, bua kulongololeye bintu bia or ne bia argent ne bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bintu bidibo basonga n abi mabue, ne bidibo basonga n abi mitshi, ne midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Bana ba Hete bakambila Abalahama ne, Mukelenge, utunvuile, wewe udi bu muntu wa Nzambi munene munkatshi muetu, usungule muaba wa majambu nkayebe udi musue kujikarnu tshitalu etshi, kakuena muntu udi mua kukukanda bua wewe kuangata muaba wa kujikamu tshi tatu etshi
Arone uvua ne bana ba balume banayi: Nadabe, Abiku, Elazare ne Itamare

Bakamuihata mu budimi, bakamushiha
Tangila, meme nakulua bu muhumbishi webe, bualu bua nshila webe kena muakane ku mesu kuanyi, mpunda wakuntangila, wakusesuka kundi nusangu ei isatu bu mpunda muhidie kusesuka kundi, nakadi kukushiha wewe, ne nakadi kusungila mpunda
Nakuenza bualu bubi kai ku mesu kua tatu webe bua yeye udi ukeba muoyo wanyi
Hashishe lukuka, himitalu, ludi lulela bubi: ne bubi, hakolabu budi bulela lufu
Pa kutangila bunene ne bukole bwa ntatu idi mitangila ditanta dia bubanji ne dia nsombelu wa bantu idi ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata diakanangana nayi, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu mmufuka Tshipangu tshimikila mianda ya Bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bantu, tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi milomba pa mianda eyi kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga ne kudi Bukalenga bunene
Yeye udi musue muan abo udi muikale mu munya, ne tshilenduishi katshiena munda muandi

Nunku uhingane biebe talalâ, bua wewe kufikishi baminyimpala ba Bena Peleshete munda

Yehowa atemeshe mpala wandi kunudi, anufuile luse
Tshiena mua kudimanya nkayanyi; Malu au onso adi muomumue kundi nunku ndi ngamba ne, Biashiha tshihuhu bantu lubilu, Buloba budi bufidibua mu bianza bia bantu babi; Matuku anyi adi ahita luendu lua messager lubilu, Adi ahita bu mudi matu a ntuhu enda, Bingamba ne, Nempue meji adi annyingalasha muoyo, ndi ntshina makenga anyi onso, Nempishibue; Binowa ne neige, wewe neungele mu mutubu wa bintampi kabidi, Bualu bua yeye kena muntu bu meme bua meme kumukudimuna dî, Kakuena musungi hankatshi betu Umushe biandi mulangala wandi kundi, hashishe, nakadi kuakula ne tshia kadi kumutshina, Yobo Mutshima wanyi wakutondeshibua bua muoyo wanyi; Nengambile Nzambi ne, Kumpishi nansha; Bidi bimpe ku mesu kuebe bua wewe kunkengesha, Wewe udi ne mesu bu a muntu wa ha buloba, anyi
Hakadi balume aba bumuka kudiye, Petelo wakambila Yesu ne, Mukelenge, hatudi kunoko mbimpe, tuasai bitanda bisatu, tshikuabo ntshiebe, tshinga ntshia Mose, tshikuabo ntshia Eliya; Petelo kakamanya tshiakadiye wamba
Eyo, bantu bonso ba mu buloba ebu nebikale ne mudimu wa kubajika; Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Muanda eu neubavuishile lumu lunene mu dituku dindi mmuenesha butumbi buanyi
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, ambila Yelushalema ne, Wewe udi buloba budi kabuyi bulengeshibue, budi nvula kayi mulokelehu mu dituku dia tshiji tshikole
Wakenza nunka bua kulesha buakane buandi mu tshikondo etshi, bua yeye kuikala muakane ne mubingishi wa muntu yonso udi witabusha Yesu
Nubale bonsu badi ne bidimu bituadije ku makumi abidi, badi mua kuenza mudimu wa bena mvita
Hashishe angata mulum a ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, umuoshe mu muaba musungula wa mu luhangu lua ntempelo udi kauyi mu tshitendelelu
Diba adi, muaba wikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu musungule bua kusomba, nenumutuadile milambu eyi mishilangane, imvua munuambile: ya kuosha, ya bobumue, ya tshia dikumi tshia bintu bia mu madimi, ya budisuile, ne ya mapiku, inuvua bamulaye
Ku luseke ludi diba dibuelela, mukalu wenu newikale Mayi manene a pankatshi pa matunga

Nengenze tshishima etshi malaba
Hashishe kamanda wakasemena hehi, wakamukuata, wakamba bua kumusuikabo ne nkanu ibidi, wakabanga kubebesha ne, Udi nganyi
Mukelenge wakatuma disalayi diakadi sentedi, wakadiambila ne, Ulue ne mutu wandi; diakaya biadi, diakamukosa mutu mu nsubu wa lukanu, diakalua ne mutu wandi ha dilonga, diakauha nsongakashi, nsongakashi wakauha mamu andi
Muvua kabidi mbuji ya mpumbu dikumi ne ibidi bua milambu ya kukobolola nayi bantu, ngombe milume makumi abidi ne inayi, mikoku ya bimpanga makumi asambombu, mbuji ya mpumbu makumi asambombu ne bana ba mikoku makumi asambombu ba tshidimu tshimue, bua milambu ya bobumue
Wewe newasuike bu tshimanyinu ku tshianza tshiebe, ne hankatshi ha makiki
Bialeleye muana mulume udi munyengi wa bintu ne mumatshishi wa mashi hanshi, anyi udi wenza bualu bukuabo budi bua mushindu eu; udi uhanga kuenza malu akadiye ne bua kuenza, kadi wakudia munyinyi muelele mpingu ha mikuna, ne wakunyanga mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi, wakuenzela bahele ne bakengi bibi, wakunyenga bintu ku bukole, kakuhingasha tshieva kudi muen atshi, wakutangisha mesu andi ku mpingu, wakuenza malu a bundu, wakusombesha bakuabo bintu bua kuheta kasombela ne wakudiangatshila makasa, muntu eu neikale ne muoyo, anyi

Nunku Yoshua wakalua kudibo tshimpalantanta, bualu bua yeye wakumuka ku Gilegala wenda butuku bujima

Bakaya, bakamona kuakadiye mutule

Muntu yonsu uvua usulula tshibombi tshiende
Bualu bua yeye udi ditalala dietu, wakatuvuisha bubidi buetu bu muntu umue, wakashimbula lumbu lua hankatshinkatshi luakadi lutuhandulula hakamaneye njia ne lufu lua mubidi wandi, njia mene ya mu mikenshi yakadi ne mikandu ne mayisha; bua kufukeye ne bubidi buabo munda muandi muntu umue muhia muhia; nunku wakabavuishila ditalala; bua yeye abalengeshishe bubidi buabo ne Nzambi mu mubidi umue bua mutshi wandi mutshiamakane, kuakashiheye n au njia

Yeye wakasa kabidi Bete holona ku mutu kua mukuna ne Bete holona mukuabo mu tshibanda, misoko ya ngumbu, ne bibi bia biamu; wakasa Balata ne misoko mikuabo yakadi n ai Solomo bua kutekamu bintu biandi ne misoko ya makalu andi ne misoko ya bena nvita bandi bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu ne misoko yonso yakasua Solomo kuasa mu Yelushalema ne mu Lebanona, ne mu nseke yonso yakakokesheye
Bulelela, ndi nubatiza mu mai bualu bua nuenu nukudimune mitshima yenu; kadi udi ulua ku nyima kuanyi udi muntambe meme, tshiena ne buakane bua kutuala bisabata biandi; yeye neanubatize mu tshihehudi tshiandi tshidi mu tshianza, yeye neatokeshe tshituilu tshiandi bimpe; yeye neasangishe mponda wandi mu mudiba, kadi yeye neoshe bisote mu kahia kadi kakai kajima tshiendelele
Nunku nebikale bantu banyi ne meme nengikale Nzambi wabo
Nenusungule mukelenge wa mu tshisamba ne tshisamba bua kunutahuluila buloba
Hashishe, yeye wakebesha balume ba mu musoko ne, Mukashi au wa masandi wakadi ku Enayima udi kudi kunyi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Buloba bua Bena Kasada nebuikale bu tshintu tshinyengibue mu nvita
Nakamuebesha ne, Etshi ntshinyi
Nakanyingalasha mitshima yenu ne mukanda wanyi, kadi tshiena ne dibungama katataka bua buala abu; kadi nakadi ne dibungama bua ndi ntangila ne mukanda au wakanyingalasha mitshima yenu, kadi anu bua musangu muihi , katataka ndi ne disanka, kambualu bua nuakanyingalashibua, kadi bualu bua nuakanyingalashibua tô ne ku dikudimuna dia mitshima yenu; bualu bua nuakanyingalashibua bu mudi Nzambi musue, bua nuenu kanujimishi tshintu tshimue bua bualu buetu
Ada uvua mulelele Esawu muana anu umue: Elifaze
Kinshasa ke tshimenga tshia mpwilamambu tshia ditunga ne kabidi lubanza lwa bishimikidi bia ditunga
Muaba awu uvua mudifile kabidi kundi, mundaye bualu bunene
Nunku tuakalamba muan anyi wa balume mu mai a kahia, tuakamudia; hakatshiabu, nakamuambila ne, Ufile muan ebe wa balume, tumudie; kadi yeye wakasokoka muan andi wa balume
Kanungu ka Ditangilula dia dîyi nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kwenzeka tshikondo tshia Bukalenga bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi tshia Bukalenga bwa bilwilu, nansha tshikondu tshia bumfumu bwa ditunga bwa tshitupa tshiipi anyi padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bipanga mwa kubweeja bisangilu mu budikadidi
Hakadibo ne mpata mikole, nunku bakahanduluka, Bânaba wakangata Mâko, wakasabuka n andi ku Kupulio
Ndi tumutumbisha
Yeye wakadi muprofete, wakamanya biandi ne, Nzambi wakaditshiha ne, Nenshikike kankanunuina ka munda muebe ha nkuasa webe wa butumbi; bua yeye wakadianjila kutangila bualu ebu diambedi, wakamba bua dibika dia Kilisto ku lufu ne, Kabakamushîa mu Muaba wa Bafue, mubidi wandi kawakabola
Nunku Sadoka muakuidi, ne Natana muprofete, ne Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, ne Bena Kelete ne Bena Pelete bakaya, bakabandisha Solomo ha nyima ha mpunda wa mukelenge Davidi, bakaya n andi ku Gihona
Baketeka nsonga ibidi mikuabo ya tukanu tuhindakana mu masoso abidi, nunku bakatuteka ha bilulu bia efoda bia ha maha ku mpala kua tshilulu
Bua meme tshikuhumbishi musangu mule, ndi nkutendekena bua wewe kutelesha mei makese atudi n au bua lutulu luebe
Baluishi benu nebanubutule
Hashishe bantu bakuabo bakaya, bakamanyisha Davidi muakenzeleye bantu bandi
Datane ne Abirame bavua bapatuke mu ntenta yabu, bimane pambelu ne bakaji babu, bana babu ne bena meku abu bonsu
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Meme musangane bantu bakane makumi atanu mu Sodome, nemfuile musoku mujima luse bualu buabu
Yosefe wakela bantu bandi mukenji bua kulongololabo tshitalu tshia tatu wandi, banganga buka bakalongolola tshitalu tshia Isalele
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kwelangana mvita mu olodonase mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, panyima pa bamana kweebeja Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bilwilu ne bamana kupeta dianyisha dia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne dia batshipwita bakulumpe, bilondeshila kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi
Biambeye ne, Mbimpe, hashishe muntu webe neikale talalâ, kadi biakuateye tshiji, Umanye biebe ne yeye wakahangidisha bua kungenzela bibi
Kusunaye mayi kabulubulu tente, kunuisha muana
Kadi Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, yeye kena mungunvuile; Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kuakushika, kungambidi bualu ebu kabidi
Nuenu bapite mu njila, basangane disua dia nyunyi kulu kua mutshi nansha panshi, pikala nyunyi awu muladile, nansha mumane kutoya, kanumukuatshi musangu umue ne bana bende to
Nebikale bintu biebe wewe, ne bia bana bebe ba balume ne ba bakaji, bilondeshile ndondu utuvua batue nebe, kabidi ne ndelanganyi yebe yonsu
Bualu bua tshiakaluangata kudi muntu; kabakalunyisha; luakalua kundi mu dibuluibua dia Yesu Kilisto
Bantu banene bakaha bantu ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bintu biakasuabo mu mitshima yabo
Mukelenge wakankudimuna ne, Ndi bianyi Yesu ûdi ukengesha; kadi bika, wimane, bua bualu ebu nakumuenekela kûdi bua kukusungula bu muenji wa mudimu wanyi ne bu mumanyishi wa malu awakumona ne wa malu anamuenekela kûdi; nenkusungile mu bianza bia bantu ne bia bisamba bia bende, bandi nkutuma kudibo, bua wewe kubulula mesu abo, bakome nyima ku midima batangile ku munya, bakoma nyima ku bukole bua Satana batangile kudi Nzambi, bua bobo bahete dijimisha dia mibi yabo ne buhianyi munkatshi mua badi balengeshibue ku ditabusha didibo bangitabusha n adi
Hashishe bakahingana mu Yelushalema bafuma ku mukuna udibo babikila ne, Oleve, udi biau hehi ne Yelushalema, bu ntanta wa luendu lua dituku dia Lumingu tua Bayuda
Bua bualu ebu adi musue kukuvuluisha bua wewe usonsole tshihedi tshia Nzambi, tshidi munda muebe bua kukutentekesha kua bianza bianyi
Kanungu ka Mu diumvwangana ne Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Bukalenga bunene budi busunguluja tshidiidi tshia Ditunga ne budi bwambula bujitu bwaatshi
Wewe wakulonda mu nshila wakenda mukulu ebe wa bakashi; nunku nenteke luhanza luandi mu tshianza tshiebe
Nzambi wakabutula Bena Bete shemeshe bualu bua bobo bakatangila munda mua mushete wa Yehowa, wakashiha bantu binunu makumi atanu ne makumi muanda mutekete: bena musoko bakadila muadi bualu bua Yehowa wakashiha bantu ba bungi ne kushiha kukole
Menu ebe adi bu tshisumbu tshia mikoko idi ifuma ku tshiowelu tshia mai; buonso buai yakalela bana ba mahasa, nansha umue wai wakufua
Kayine kuasa tshimenga, kutshinyika dina dia muanende Enoke
Kadi ba bidime, hakamonabo muana, bakambilangana ne, Eu udi muhianyi; tuyai kumushiha, netuangate buhianyi buandi
Bimenga ebi bionso biakadi ne miaba yabi ya ku matshika mibinyunguluke: bimenga bionso biakadi nunku

Maweja Nangila kuandamuna Moshe ne: Nenkuleje buakane buanyi, nenkuambile kabidi dina dianyi dia Maweja Nangila
Bavua benza mudimu muaba wa tshijila mu dina dia bena Izrayele bonsu
Mu dituku adi Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba, ne monai, disanka dia bungi didiku ne musangelu, Yehowa wa misumba wakadimuenesha mu dî dinakunvua mu matshu anyi ne, Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba, udi wamba ne, Ya biebe kudi mulami eu wa bintu, kudi Shebena mene, udi ha mutu ha nsubu wa mukelenge, umuebeshe ne, Udi wenza tshinyi kunoko, ne udi ne muntu kai kunoko, bua wewe wakudiumbuila majambu
Hanuamba ne, Muntu yonso udi wenza malu mabi udi muakane ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne yeye udi usanka bualu buandi; anyi hanuakonka ne, Nzambi utu walumbulula bilumbu ne kulumbulula kuakane udi kudi kunyi
Ulongeshe Yoshuwa malu onsu
Kadi Kilisto, mumane kulua muakuidi munene wa mu bintu bimpe bilualua, bualu bua tshitendelelu tshitamba bunene ne buakane, katshî tshiasa ne bianza, tshidi bu kuamba ne, Katshiena tshia bifukibua ebi, kembua mashi a mbushi ne a bana ba ngombe, kadi bua mashi andi mene, wakabuela mu muaba mutambe tshijila musangu umue tshiendelele, mumane kuangatshila bantu dihikula dia tshiendelele
Nudimuke bienu, bua kanudidingi mu mitshima yenu, kanusesuki bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo midimu ne kuyitendelela; bualu bua Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, yeye neabuikile diulu ne nvula kayena iloka, ne buloba kabuena bukuama bintu; nunku nenujimishibue lubilu mu buloba buimpe buakamba Yehowa
Bateke tshilambuilu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi bua kuosha manananshi
Hakandeshabo ne, Badi belela muntu eu tshifufu, nakumutuma kûdi lubilu; nakambila bamubandi kabidi bua kuyabo kumubandila ku mesu kuebe
Pikala tshilamba atshi ne mashi, bakulu ba mu tshimenga nebakuate mulume awu, bamunyoke
Pashishe bintu bionsu bia ngombe bidi bishale, bu tshiseba, munyinyi, mutu, bikonu, bia munda ne bunyawu bonsu budimu, mutuangaji umuke nabi ku mitanda, aye kubioshila pa nkunyi ya kapia, muaba musunguluke udibu bimansha butu bua ku tshilambuilu

Kuinyikaye mutu panshi

Nakenza bu muakangambileye
Tshidimu atshi, numulekele, aye ne bana bende kuabu
Yoshua Udi Umona Muntu ne Muele wa Nvita Hakadi Yoshua hehi ne Yeleko, wakabanduluka, wakatangila ne, monai, muntu wakadi muimane hehi n andi ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi, ne Yoshua wakaya kudiye, wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi ku luseke luetu anyi ku luseke lua badi n etu lukuna
Ntatu idi mua kuenza nunka, anyi kanyinganyinga, anyi tshinyangu, anyi tshiole, anyi butaka, anyi njû, anyi muele wa nvita
Kadi padiye kayi usukula bilamba biende, kayi wowa mayi pambidi, neapete tshibawu
Ne Adama wa kunshikidilu wakalua nyuma udi uhesha bantu muoyo
Mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshimue tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Omeli wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele; wakabakokesha bidimu dikumi ne bibidi; wakabakokesha bidimu bisambombo mu Tîsa
Angata mashi andi makuabo, laba ku nsengu inai ya tshioshelu, ne ku matumba anai a tshituha tshia tshioshelu tshidi muinshi mua matshua, ne ku mihimbu idi mitshinyunguluke; nunku lengesha tshioshelu ne utshiumushile bubi
Nakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi, wewe udi mumanye
Nuenu badi banemeka Yehowa, nueyemene Yehowa
Kulondolola kua Tshiota tshia Shaula Mu Gibeona nuakashikama Yiele, tatu wa Gibeona; dina dia mukashi wandi diakadi Mâka; Abidona wakadi muan a bute wandi, ne Sû ne Kishi ne Bâla ne Nê ne Nadaba ne Gedô ne Ahio ne Zekâya ne Mikelota
Nakinama dî dikole difuma mu nkuasa wa butumbi diamba ne, Tangilai, nsubu wa tshilulu wa Nzambi udi munkatshi mua bantu, ne yeye neikale n abo, ne bobo nebikale bantu bandi; ne Nzambi mume neikale n abo, neikale Nzambi wabo
Nemfundulule pa mabue apu mikenji ya mushindu umue ne ivua pa mabue auvua munyange
Ne ditekemena kadiena difuisha bundu, bualu bua luse lua Nzambi luakitshikila mu mitshima yetu kudi Nyuma Muimpe wakafukeye

Nyuma wa Nzambi wakabanga kumuenzesha mu Mahane dana, hankatshi ha Solea ne Eshetaola

Bualu Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Bualu buenu kabuena nunku; wasua kulua munene munkatshi muenu neikale muena mudimu wenu; wasua kuikala ha mutu henu neikale muhika wenu; nunku kabidi Muana wa muntu kakuluila bua bantu bamukuatshile mudimu, wakuluila bua kubakuatshila mudimu ne bua kufila muoyo wandi bua kuhikula n au bantu ba bungi

Agare kuimita difu

Kanutshinyi
Tshisamba tshia Dane:
Musulu wa Yaboke udi wenza mukalu wadi ne ditunga dia bena Amone
Wakidikisha tshinunu tshikuabo, wakampitshisha mu mai, mai akafika mu binu bianyi
Nunku Hilama wakaha Solomo mitshi ya cèdre ne ya cyprès bu muakasueye muonso
Lelu nenujadike ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi wenda kumpala kuenu
Hakahita matuku â, meme, Nebukadenesâ, nakabanduluka ne nakatangisha mesu anyi mu diulu; meji anyi akahingana kundi
Bikaleye kayi ne bintu bia kubuhikula n abi, nunku buloba buakahaneye nebuikale mu bianza bia muntu wakabusumba tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene buloba nebuhikudibue ne yeye neahingane mu buloba buandi
Yolama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi
Wakatuma miloho kudi Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele, ku musoko, imuambila ne, Bene hadada udi wamba ne, Tshiamu tshiebe tshia argent ne tshiamu tshiebe tshia or mbanyi; ne bakashi bebe ne bana bebe badi batamba buakane mbanyi kabidi
Kubeleshaye mu nzubu wa lukanu, kua Potifare, mu nzubu muvuabu balamine Yozefe
Dishone uvua mulele Emdane, Eshebane, Itrane ne Kerane
Bua muanda eu, mukelenge wanyi, wanji kuitabusha lungenyi luanyi: ulekele mibi yebe, uhingashe bienzedi biakane mu muaba wai; ulekele malu ebe a tshishiku, ufuile bahele luse; nunku, bumue, diakalengele diebe nedileheshibue
Hakanyema Ebeyatâ, muana wa Ahimeleke, kudi Davidi mu Kila, yeye wakadi mulue ne efoda mu tshianza tshiandi
Nebabidie amu kudi bena diku diebe, balume ne bakaji, badi kabayi ne mikiya
Alesandelo wakabahoha tshianza, wakamba kudividila ku mesu kua bantu
Moshe uvua muenze malu a dikema ne bukole bua bungi, bena Izrayele bonsu batangile
bilongelu bikulu ne bilongelu bikwabo bia mianda ya mamanya, mamanya mapiluke anyi a midimu bidibu bâsa anyi bambulwisha kudi Bukalenge bunene anyi kudi makalenga a polovensa ne bidi mêyi a ditunga mâmba ne bidi ne diambulwisha bwa ditunga dijima;

Nansha biavudishabo bana munkatshi mua bana babo, Bena Samalea nebahishibue Hoshea Nuenu, Bena Isalele, hinganai kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu, Nuye ne mei makane, Bena Ashû kabena batusungila; Meme nengondahe, nenshikishe kutomboka kuabo; Nengikale bu mume kudi Bena Isalele, matamba abo neabaluluke; Nebahingane, nebashikame mu dileshi dianyi, Bena Efelayima, mpingu yenu idi ne mushinga kai kundi kabidi
Hashishe bakamona tupitene tua makalu Yehoshafata, tuakambilangana ne, Kayeu mukelenge wa Isalele
Ke kumiaminaye kabidi mashi avua mashale ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Mpindiewu ndi musue kupingana
Bualu bua lukuka lua biuma bobo nebendulule n enu mushinga ne mei a mashimi; dihila diabo diakabahishabo n adi kale kadiena dishanguluka, ne dibutuke diabo kadiena dilala tulu
Bantu ba Davidi bakamuambila ne, Mona, tuetu ludi tutshina kunoko mu Yuda, nunku ludi tutamba kutshina bua kuya ku Kila bua kuluangana ne Bena Peleshete nansha
Shaula wakamba ne, Nuenu bukelenge ba bantu, Semenai ha buihi, tumanye bietu, tujingulule bilengele kuakafuma bualu ebu bubi lelu eu
Nuenu mumane ku mbelu ne muntu uwakusombesha tshintu nealuhuke kûdi ne tshieya
Yeye wakamba ne, Wewe kuena mua kumona mpala wanyi; bualu bua muntu kena mua kumona mpala wanyi ne kuikala ne muoyo
Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda bakadi bashikama mu misoko ya Yuda bakalua ne tshia dikumi tshia ngombe ne tshia mikoko, ne tshia dikumi tshia bintu biakajidilabo Yehowa Nzambi wabo; bakabiteka hanshi mu bisumbu
Kadi ku dikombu dia bena Levi ufundeku dina dia Arone
Arame kulela bana ba balume aba: Use, Ule, Ngetere ne Masha
Bakumusha milambu ya kuosha bua kuyifila kudi Yehowa bu muakadi kutahulula kua nsubu ya batatu abo, bana ba mu ditunga, bu muakafundabo mu mukanda wa Mose
Mudimu wonso udi uvudisha muntu bintu, Tshifulu tshia butumbi tshia bena meji tshidi biuma biabo, kadi tshifulu Mumonyi udi wamba mei a bushuwa udi ubandisha mioyo, Udi utshina Yehowa udi ne tshieyemenu tshikole, Ditshina dia Yehowa didi mushimi wa mai a muoyo, Bantu bavule mbutumbi bua mukelenge, Udi kayi ukuata tshiji lubilu udi ne lungenyi lule, Mutshima muhole udi muoyo wa mubidi, Udi ukengesha muhele udi uhenda Mufuki wandi, Muntu mubi udi wedibua hanshi bua malu mabi andi, Meji adi ashikama talalâ mu mutshima wa mujinguludi wa mianda, kadi kaena Buakane budi butuma tshisamba tshia bantu ku mpala, Muena mudimu udi ne meji udi uheta diakalengele kudi mukelenge wandi, Nsumuinu Dî dia kalolo didi diandamuna tshiji, Ludimi lua muena meji ludi luhatula lungenyi, Mesu a Yehowa adi kuonso, Ludimi ludi luamba mei a kalolo ludi bu mutshi wa muoyo, kadi ludi luamba mei a buhidia ludi lunyanga Muhote udi uhetula diyisha dia tatu andi, Mu nsubu wa muntu muakane mudi tshibutshilu tshinene, Mishiku ya bena meji idi itangalasha lungenyi, Mulambu udi bantu babi bafila udi utondesha Yehowa, Bienzedi bia muntu mubi bidi bitondesha Yehowa, Nebakengeshe muntu udi uhambuka mu nshila bikole; Muaba wa Bafue ne wa Kubutuka Mubuidi kena musue bantu bamubele; Mutshima wa disanka udi uvuisha mpala wa musangelu, Mutshima wa mujinguludi wa mianda udi ukeba lungenyi, Matuku onso a mukengi adi mabi, Kuikala ne bintu bibalê ne ditshina dia Yehowa kudi kutamba Kudia anu matamba nkayau hadi dinanga Muntu udi ukuata tshiji lukasa udi usonsola nvita, Nshila wa mufuba udi ne luhangu lua mingonge ya meba, Muana mulume wa meji udi usankisha tatu andi, Buhote budi disanka kudi muntu udi kayi ne meji, Bikalaku kakuyi bulombodi bua meji, malu adi bantu bahangidisha adi ahumbishibua, Disanka didi dikuata muntu bua dî didi mukana muandi muandamune; Kudi muena meji nshila wa muoyo udi kulu, Yehowa udi usasula nsubu wa badi badisue, Meji a malu mabi adi atondesha Yehowa, Muntu udi ne lukuka lua luhetu udi ukengesha ba mu nsubu muandi, Mutshima wa muntu muakane udi welangana meji a bualu budiye mua kukudimuna, Yehowa udi kule ne bantu babi, Ntangidilu wa musangelu udi usankisha mutshima, Udi ne matshu adi ateleja mibelu ya muoyo Udi ubenga diyisha udi uhetula muoyo wandi, Ditshina dia Yehowa didi diyisha dia meji, Nsumuinu Malu adi bantu bahangidisha mu mitshima adi afuma kudibo, Nshila yonso idi muntu wendela idi mitoke ku mesu kuandi, Teka mudimu webe mu bianza bia Yehowa, Yehowa wakafuka tshintu tshionso ne kafukila katshi; Muntu yonso udi ne kudisua mu mutshima udi utondesha Yehowa, Luse lujalame ne lulamatu lua ku bushuwa bidi bibuikila malu mabi, Bikala bienzedi bia muntu bisankishe Yehowa, Kuikala ne bintu bibale ne buakane kudi kuhita Mutshima wa muntu udi uhangidisha bua kuya ku luendu, kadi Yehowa udi ulombola makasa andi
Hashishe wakalua n anyi mu tshiendelu tshia munda ku luseke lua ku esete; wakidikisha tshibuelelu tshia munda bu muakidikisheye bikuabo, ne nsubu yatshi ya bansentedi ne biluwa biatshi ne mbalanda watshi, wakabimona bikale ne bunene buobumue ne bua bikuabo

Bantu kabakamukudimuna
Nunku nufuishe bituha bia mibidi yenu ya ha buloba: masandi, malu a bukoya, nkuka ya mubidi, disamina dibi dia mutshima, ne dikuma dia mutshima ku bintu didi kutendelela kua mpingu mene; bua malu â tshishi tshia Nzambi tshidi tshilua kudi bana ba buhidia; anuakendamu kabidi diambedi hanuakikala ne muoyo munkatshi mua malu â

Shafana wakaubala ku mpala kua mukelenge
Ne bingikala ne tshihedi tshia kuambila bantu dî dia Nzambi, ne binamanya malu onso atshidi masokoka ne lungenyi luonso, ne bingikala ne ditabusha dionso dindi mua kumusha n adi mikuna, kadi bingikala tshi ne luse, ndi tshianana

Malaya Pashishe Moshe kumanyisha bamfumu ba meku a bena Izrayele mikenji mikuabu ya kudi Maweja Nangila ya ne: Pikala muntu mulaye bua kulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu, nansha mutshipe bua kujila tshintu, udi ne bua kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bidiye mulaye abi

Nudisangishe bua kuntendelela

Bena Ejipitu bamona nanku, kutshinabu bena Izrayele bikole

Kakuena tshilumbu to
Bualu bua yeye wakandinga misangu ibidi wakamana kuangata bintu bianyi bia buan a bute, ne lelu wakangata disanka dianyi kabidi

Davidi wakashikama ne Akisha mu Gata, yeye ne bantu bandi, muntu ne muntu ne ba mu nsubu wandi, ne Davidi ne bakashi bandi babidi, Abinoama, Muena Yizelele, ne Abigayila, muena Kâmele, wakadi mukashi wa Nabala

Ndi nsakidila Nzambi; ndi nutamba buonso buenu kuakula miaku; kadi mu ekelesia ndi ntamba kusua kuakula mei atanu ne meshi anyi, bua kuyisha bakuabo kabidi, ku mpala kua kuakula mei lubombo mu muaku udibo kabai bamanye
Nenuntuadile mampa abidi a ku nzubu yenu bua kundambula
Pamvua mu madilu, tshiena mudie tshia dikumi atshi
Wakatuala bintu bimpe bionso bia mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bia mu nsubu wa mukelenge; wakakosa bintu bia or bionso bituha bituha biakenza Solomo, mukelenge wa Isalele, mu ntempelo wa Yehowa, bu muakamba Yehowa
Tudi basue muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi muenu aleshe disuminyina diodiumue bua kuheta tshiuwidi tshia ditekemena tô ne kunshikidilu; bua kanulu bienu bahungidi, kadi nulue bidikishi ba badi bahiana milayi bua ditabusha ne lutulu
Nenku biakudia bia tshianyi bia mu madimi enu binudi nunowa abi: nansha mampa, nansha midioku mibishi, nansha miosha, kanuena mua kubidia, kanuyi banji kubindambula

Ndi bianyi bidia bia muoyo

Lumu luakufika, Yehowa, ndi mumanye ne nshila wa muntu kena munda muandi; Yehowa, umbele, kadi umbele mu kulumbulula kuakane; Hongolola tshiji tshiebe ha mutu ha bisamba bidi kabiyi bikumanye, Yelemiya Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Unvua mei a tshihungidi etshi, umanyishe bantu balume ba mu Yuda ne Bena Yelushalema, ubambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Mulau neukuate muntu udi kayi unvua mei a mu tshihungidi etshi, tshinakahunga ne bankambua benu dituku dinakabaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu ditanda mudibo bafula tshiamu, ngamba bianyi ne, Nutumikile dî dianyi, nuenze malu onso andi nnuambila
Bantu ba Davidi bakamuambila ne, Mona, dituku diakakuambila Yehowa ne, Mona neufile muena lukuna webe mu tshianza tshiebe, diakufika; wewe umuenzele bu mûdi umona ne mbimpe
Nenteke mikalu yenu ku Dishiba Dikunze tô ne ku mai manene a Bena Peleshete, ne ku tshihela tô ne ku musulu wa Pelata, bualu bua meme nenfile bena buloba mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenubihate ku mpala kuenu
Wewe wakungambila ne, Bulelela, nenkue nzele bimpe, nenkukumbashile tunkanunuina tuebe bungi bua nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene, idibo kabayi mua kubala
Ngulube kena muakane kunudi, bualu bua udi ne mikono mihanduluke, kadi kena uhingishilula bintu mukana
Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Mahanayima, Bashana mujima, bukelenge buonso bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, ne misoko yonso ya Yai, idi mu Bashana, misoko makumi asambombo: ne tshituha tshia Gilada ne Ashetalota ne Edelei; misoko ya mu bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana yakadi ya Maki, muana wa Manashe, ya tshituha tshia bana ba Maki ku meku abo
Meme tshiena muhite bana ba balume dikumi kudi, anyi
Hakatangila Davidi muanjelo wakadi ushiha bantu, yeye wakambila Yehowa ne, Mona, nakenza bibi, nakenza bualu buhote; kadi mikoko ei yakenza tshinyi
Nunemeke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, numulamate amu yeye
Bantu kabakamuoshela bintu mu madilu andi bu muakenzelabo batatu bandi
Nuakakenga mu malu a bungi nunku tshianana, anyi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nansha umue wa munkatshi muenu kahangidishi bualu mu mutshima wandi bua kuenzeleye muena mutumba n andi bibi; kanunangi mutshihu wa mashimi, bualu bua ndi nkina malu â onso
Mulume eu nealue ne mulambu wa kubuikila n au disambuka diandi dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusangakena, neafile tshimpanga tshia mulambu wa kubuikila n au disambuka diandi dia mikenji
Aba mbantu bakafuma mu Tele mela, Tele hâsha, Keluba, Adona ne Imê, bobo kabakadi mua kujadika biota biabo ne bankambua babo ne tunkanuniuna tuabo ne, Tudi Bena Isalele: Bana ba Delaya, bana ba Tobiya, bana ba Nekoda nkama isambombo ne makumi anai ne babidi
Nanku nusungule bena mvita tshinunu ku tshisamba tshionsu tshia bena Izrayele
Yehowa wakamba ne, Teka tshianza tshiebe mu tshiadi kabidi
Kukuatabu kabidi bakaji ne bana bonsu, kuya nabu
Umue wabo wakakanka muntu wakadi muluate bilulu bia lin, wakadi umueneka ku mutu kua mai a musulu, ne, Malu â a kukema neashike tshikondo kai
Kadi bualu bua bulema buende, kena mua kusemena pabuipi ne tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja muaba wa tshijila, nansha kutantshila pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, bualu udi mua kunyanga muaba wanyi wa tshijila
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi webe wakungendesha dikasa dimpe
Katataka, Mukelenge Nzambi wetu, wakuluhula bantu bebe mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku tshianza tshikole, wakunvuisha dina diebe dinene bu mudidi lelu eu, tuakuenza bibi, tuakuenza malu mabi
Yesu wakabambila ne, Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Diambedi kabai banze kulela Abalahama, meme ndiku

Mbimpe witabe tshindi nkuambila
Katshiakadi kudi bantu aba bakenza bibi, bena mibidi yabo yakahona hanshi mu tshihela, anyi

Bualu bobu kabena bamona, kabena bamanya bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila munuenzele bua kunuleja bukole buende
Bikala muntu ne muana mulume udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, katu watumikila dî dia tatu wandi anyi dia mamu wandi, ne yeye katu wabahvuila biamukengeshaho, hashishe tatu wandi ne mamu wandi nebamukuate, nebaluhuke n andi kudi bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne ku tshibi tshia musoko; nebambile bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne, Muana wetu eu udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, kena utumikila mei etu; udi muena lumpukusu ne mukuatshiki wa maluvu
Palô wakabikila Mose, wakamuambila ne, Yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa, shiyai anu mikoko ne ngombe, bana benu bakese baye n enu

Hashishe, bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele bakadisangisha hamue, bakalua kudi Samuele ku Lama; bakamuambila ne, Tangila, wewe udi muntu mununu, ne bana bebe ba balume kabalu benda mu makasa ebe, nunku utusungile mukelenge wa kuikaleye utulumbulula bu mudi ba bisamba bionso benza
Kadi katshia tualekela kuoshila mukelenge mukashi wa mu diulu musenga wa manananshi ne kumuhongoluela milambu ya Dia kunua, tuakukengela bintu bionso, tuakufua ku muele wa nvita ne ku tshiole

Hakajidilabo nsubu eu wa Nzambi bakafila milambu ya ngombe lukama ne bimpanga nkama ibidi ne bana ba mikoko nkama inai; bakafila milambu ya kubuikila n ai mibi ya Bena Isalele bonso mpumbu ya mbushi dikumi ne ibidi bu bungi bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Bantu bakane badi bamona malu â ne badi basanka, bamba ne, Bushuwa, hakadi n etu lukuna bakubutuka, Unvuangane biebe ne Nzambi, wikale ne ditalala; Itabusha diyisha dia mukana muandi, Biwahingana kudi Wa Bukole Buonso, biadihuekesha, biwela tshiamu tshia or ha buloba, Wa Bukole Buonso neikale tshiamu tshiebe tshia or Mu diba adi neusanke mu Wa Bukole Buonso, Neumutendelele ne yeye neakunvuile, Neuhangidishe bualu, nebujalame bua bualu buebe; Bualu bua Nzambi udi uhuekesha badi badibandisha, Neabandishe muntu mene udi kayi mubingishibue, Yobo Hashishe, Yobo wakakudimuna Elifaza ne, Lelu mene kutontolola kuanyi kutshidi bu kutomboka, Nakadi kusua kumanya kundi mua kusangakana n andi, Nakadi kuteka bualu buanyi buonso hatoke ku mpala kuandi, Nakadi kusua kumanya mei adiye ungandamuna, Yeye wakadi kufuilangana n anyi mu bukole buandi bunene, anyi

Bikala ne dijinga dieetu dimwe dia kwibaka munkatshi mwa Aflika Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu ne Ditunga dia bukole ne bubanji dishindameena pa mungalata mulelela wa tshidiidi, wa bubanji, wa nsombelu wa bantu ne wa bunkambwa; Pa kumona ne dipangika dia bululama ne mamuma adi, dipangila dia kunyooka benzavi, ditabaleela anu balela ne balunda, ditabaleela anu beena polovensa wa momumwe, ditabaleela anu beena tshisamba tshia momumwe, ditabaleela anu beena dîku dia momumwe, mu dilondangana diawu, ke didi mfuki wa diupuka dia mishinga yetu ya bunkambwa ne wa dinyanguka dia ditunga; Bajadika dipangadika diabo dia kulaminyina ne kukolesha budikadidi ne kabumwe ka ditunga mu dinemeka dia ngikadilu yetu mîmpe mishilashilangana ne ya pa bwaayi; Bajadikulula dianyisha dieetu ne didifila ne dilamata dieetu ku Déclaration Universelle des Droits de l Homme, ku Charte Africaine des Droits de l Homme et des peuples , ku Conventions des Nations Unies sur les Droits de l Anfants et sur les Droits de la Femme, nangananga ku kipatshila ka dileeja mpala dia momumwe dia mulume ne mukaji mu bishimikidi bia ditunga ne mu bulongolodi bwa matunga butangila dilama ne dikolesha mapa a bumuntu; Batuma kudi dijinga dia kumona Mbulamatadi ya Aflika idisangisha ne yenza midimu mu diumvwangana bwa kujululula ne kukolesha kabumwe ka beena Aflika mu ndongolwelu ya Aflika mujima, ya bitupa ne ya bitupa bia mwinshi bia Aflika, bwa kupeesha beena Aflika mishindu mîmpe menemene ya kuvunguluka ne ya kutantshisha bubanji ne nsombelu wa bantu; Badifila anu ku dikolesha dia bukwatshishanganyi bwa matunga bwikala ne makasa ne ku diumvwangana dia bisamba bia mu buloba bujima, bikala baneemaka bumuntu bwa umwe ne umwe ne mêyi maludiki a didikookesha ne a bujima bwa maloba a Mbulamatadi umwe ne umwe; Bajadikulula budikookeshi bweetu kabuyi kumbusha anyi kushipa bwa kudilongolola badilekelela ne bwa kukolesha maalu etu a tshidiidi, a bubanji, a nsombelu ne a bunkambwa, muntu ne muntu bilondeshila bweenda bukola bwa lungenyi; Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi ham bidi hanyi dilolo diambedi muntu au muhanduke kayi muanze kufika kundi; ne Yehowa wakamana kubulula mukana muanyi mu diba adi diakalua muntu au kundi dinda; nunku mukana muanyi muakabuluibua ne tshiakadi bu kamama kabidi
Tshidi ne mudimu wa kukookesha ne kushiindika budikadidi ne dikuba dia butshikuma mbila pamwe ne mishindu yônso ya dimanyisha tshibûngi maalu mu kaneemu ka dîyi
Nennuluishe, nnutangalaje mu matunga makuabu
Anyi muntu kai wakadianjila kuha Mukelenge tshintu, ne nebamuhingashiletshi kabidi
Zebula kena kapita kandi, anyi
Nenvuishe Laba bu tshikumbi tshia tumelo, ne misoko ya Bena Amona bu mpangu ya mikoko; hashishe nenumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Umuinyike Ismayele
Maweja Nangila kubamuenekela mu divuba dia muinshi, divua mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Biakuenzelabo bibi ne kakuena muntu udi kayi wenza malu mabi ne wewe udi n abo tshiji, udi ubafila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo bua kuyabo n abo bu bahika mu buloba bua bena lukuna, mu buloba budi kule anyi budi ha buihi; kadi biabangabo kuelangana meji munda muabo mu buloba buwakabatuma bu bahika, ne biakudimunabo mitshima yabo, biakutendekenabo mu buloba buwakabatuma bu bahika, bamba ne, Tuakuenza bibi, tuakuenza bualu buhote, tuakahambuka; biahinganabo kûdi ne mitshima yabo yonso ne mioyo yabo yonso, mu buloba bua bena lukuna babo bakababuesha mu buhika, biakutendelelabo ne mesu abo matangile ku buloba buabo buwakaha bankambua babo, ne ku musoko eu uwakusungula, ne ku nsubu eu unakuashila dina diebe; unvue kulomba kuabo ne kutendekena kuabo mu diulu kûdi ushikama, ujadike bualu buabo
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakatemena Bena Isalele kabidi, wakenzesha Davidi bualu buabo, wamba ne, Ya, bala bungi bua Bena Isalele ne bua Bena Yuda
Muakuidi udi ufila mulambu wa bukula budibo balamba mu nfulu ne mu tshivuadi ne mu dilonga, yeye mene neangate bintu ebi bionso
Hashishe mu miaba yonso idi musulu ubuela, bintu bidi ne muoyo bia mishindu yonso ne bidi bivulangana nebikalemu; minyinyi ya mu mai ya bungi neyikalemu; bualu bua musulu eu udi ufikaku, bua mu miaba yonso idiu ufika mai a luehu neakudimuke mai mimpe kabidi, ne bintu bionso nebikale ne muoyo kuonso kuyaya musulu
Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga tshi mu polovensa
Bayandi kabidi udi ujuka, udi umutumbisha ne, Bana bakashi bangi bakuenza bimpe, Diakalengele didi didinga, mpala mulengele udi hatuhu, Umuhe difutu dia midimu ya bianza biandi;
Mai manene adi ne nvi mitoke tô

Badi bankambua ba bisamba bibidi
Bapostolo dikumi ne babidi bakabikila tshisumbu tshionso tshia bayidi, bakamba ne, Kambimpe bia tuetu kulekela dî dia Nzambi bua kuenza mudimu wa mesa

Yeye wakadila ku mpala kuandi tô matuku muanda mutekete hakadibo badia bidia bia disanka; ne hakalua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye wakamujinguluiladi, bualu bua yeye wakamutatshisha bikole; ne yeye wakajinguluila bana babo dijimbu

Bana bakese, nudilame kudi mpingu

Kupatulabu Miriyame mu mitanda lumingu lujima
Eku kudi ditantamana, ne ditabusha dia basanto

Katataka ndi nusengelela ne, Koleshai mitshima yenu, bualu bua muoyo wa muntu umue wa munkatshi muenu kawena ujimina, anu buatu
Yesu wakabamona batata ne kuita, bualu bua tshihehele tshiakadi tshibahingisha; hakadi diba bu ha inai hatshiatshia, yeye wakalua kudibo, wenda ha mutu ha mai; yeye wakamba kubasesuka; kadi bobo, hakamumonabo wenda ha mutu ha mai, bakela meshi ne, Mukishi, bakahandalala ne mei makole, buonso buabo bakamumona, bakatshina
Wadihuekesha bu muana eu mukese, yeye udi mutambe bakuabo mu bukelenge bua mu diulu

Katataka ndî nkusengelela ne, Mukelenge wanyi unvue mei a muntu wandi

Utulekele tupite
Ubahenyishele miele ya nvula, ubamuangalashe; Olola tshianza tshiebe mulu mûdi mushikame, Mukana muabo mudi muamba mei a mashimi, Nzambi, nenkuindile musambu muhia muhia; Wewe udi uha bakelenge luhandu mu nvita, Unsungile, umpandishe mu tshianza tshia bantu ba bende, Bana betu ba balume bikale bakole mu bunsongalume buabo Mayeba etu ûle tente, ngombe yetu ituale bujitu bua bungi

Kanubenzedi bibi to
Hashishe, umue wa baselafima wakahahala kundi, muikale ne dikala dia kahia diakadi ditema mu tshianza tshiandi, diakangateye ne lukuatu ku tshioshelu tshia milambu

Moshe kubabadika muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Kutuadija musangu awu, mabue adi amu mu mushete amu

Badi basanka bua kungenzela bibi, Badi bamba ne, Eyo, eyo, balukishibue Bonso badi bakukeba basanke Kadi meme hanyi ndi muntu muhele, ne mukengedi; Misambu Yehowa, ndi nyemena kudi; Bualu bua buakane buebe umpandishe, usungile; Wikale kundi bu dibue dia meme kushikamahu, Nzambi wanyi, unsungile mu bianza bia muntu mubi, Bualu bua wewe, Mukelenge Yehowa, udi ditekemena dianyi; Kûdi wewe mene nkundi mushindame katshia bandela, Ndi bu muntu udi ukemesha ba bungi; Mukana muanyi mudi mûle tente ne butumbi buebe Kungumushi kûdi mu tshikondo tshia bununu buanyi; Bualu bua badi n anyi lukuna badi bambilangana bualu buanyi, Badi bamba ne, Nzambi wakunulekela; Nzambi, kuikadi n anyi kule; Badi ne muoyo wanyi lukuna bafuishibue bundu, bajimishibue; Kadi meme hanyi nengikale ne ditekemena misangu yonso, Mukana muanyi nemuambile bantu bua bienzedi bia buakane buebe, Nendue ne mei bua bienzedi binene bia Mukelenge Yehowa, Nzambi, wewe wakunyisha ku buana buanyi tô ne mpindiu; Nzambi, kundekedi nansha, tô ne ku bununu buanyi ne hangikala ne nvi; Nzambi, buakane buebe budi bufika tô ne kulu

Nusakidile Yehowa ne tshisanji, Numuimbile musambu muhia muhia, Bualu bua dî dia Yehowa didi diakane, Yeye udi unanga buakane ne kulumbulula kuakane, Ku dî dia Yehowa bintu bia mu diulu bia kufukibua, Udi ukungisha mai a mu mai manene mimane dibula; Ba ha buloba bonso batshine Yehowa; Bualu bua yeye wakamba dî diandi, ne buloba buakadiku; Yehowa udi uvuisha meji adi ba mu bisamba bia bantu bahangidisha malu a hatuhu; Lungenyi ludi Yehowa usungula ludi lujalama tshiendelele, Disanka didi kudi tshisamba tshidi ne Yehowa bu Nzambi watshi, Yehowa udi utangila hanshi, hadiye mu muaba wandi wa mu diulu, Ku muaba udiye mushikame udi ujosha talalâ yeye udi ufuka mitshima ya buonso buabo, Mukelenge kena usungidibua ku tshisumbu tshinene tshia masalayi, Kabalu ka nvita kadi tshintu tshia hatuhu kudi badi batekemena luhandu kudiku; Nuenu bansanto bandi, nutshine Yehowa; Bana balume ba nyama ya ntambue badi bakengela bia kudia, nzala idi ibasuma; Luai bienu, nuenu bana banyi ba balume, telejai matshu enu kundi; Muntu kai udiku udi unanga muoyo, Kanda ludimi luebe bua kaluambi malu mabi, Umuka ku malu mabi, enza malu mimpe; Mesu Mpala wa Yehowa udi mutangisha kudi benji ba malu mabi bua kubakengesha, Bantu bakane badi badila dikuatshisha, Yehowa udi ubunvuila, Yehowa udi ha buihi ne bantu badi ne mitshima idi itamba kunyingalala, Makenga a muntu muakane adi a bungi; Dikuatshisha dietu didi mu dina dia Yehowa Misambu Badi beyemena Yehowa badi bu mukuna wa Siona, Bu mudi mikuna inyunguluka Yelushalema, Bua dikombo dia malu mabi kadiena dishala kashidi Yehowa, wenzele bantu bakane bimpe, Kadi badi basesuka bua kuya mu nshila mikonyangale, Misambu Hakakudimuna Yehowa buhika bua Siona bua kuhingashamu bantu bandi, Mu diba adi mukana muetu muakadi mûle tente ne tuseku Yehowa wakatuenzela malu manene; Yehowa, ukudimune buhika buetu bua kutuha diakalengele; Badi bamiamina maminu ne binsonshi ku mesu Udi uya biandi, wenda udila, mutuale maminu bua kukuna, Misambu Bikala Yehowa kayi wasa nsubu, Ebu mbualu bua hatuhu ne, Nudi nubika hatshiatshia, bualu Monai, bana badi buhianyi bufume kudi Yehowa, Bu mudi mikete ya mu tshianza tshia muena bukitu, Disanka didi kudi muntu udi ne musaka wandi mule tente n abo

Ishi boshete, muana wa Shaula, wakadi ne bantu bahidi bakadi tupitene tua masalayi andi; dina dia mukuabo diakadi Bana, ne dina dia mukuabo Lekaba, bana balume ba Limona, Muena Bêlota, wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina bualu bua Bêlota udi wa tshisamba tshia Benyamina; diambedi Bena Belota bakanyemena mu Gitayima, bakashikamamu kale tô ne katataka
Ku mpala kua nsubu ne nsubu ya bansentedi kuakadi tshididi tshiakajika munda mua tshibuelelu ku luseke ne ku luseke coudée umue, ne nsubu yonso ya bansentedi yakadi coudées isambombo ku luseke ne ku luseke

Ditunga dijima kununkadi mupuya mubi
Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kufila mpala mu batshipwita bakulumpa padiye kêna ukumbaja makanyika adi alonda aa: kwikala mweena Kongu; kwikala ne mvula ya tshileledi kayiyi mishadila ku ; kwikala ne bujima bwa makookeshi a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi; kubeenga kubwelakana mu maalu adibo babenga kudi dîyi dia masungulangana
Yakobe kulala muaba awu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Wewe wakuandamuna banue; enza biebe nunku, newikale ne muoyo

Tshituha tshisatu tshia bana benu netshifue ne tshihuhu, anyi netshifue ne tshiole tshidi munkatshi muenu; tshituha tshikuabo tshisatu netshihone ku muele wa nvita ku nseke yenu yonso; nemmuangalashe tshituha tshikuabo tshisatu ku mpehele yonso, nempatule muele wa nvita bua kubihata
Bulongolodi bwa mu kabujima
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe kuena muntu unakambila bantu malu ebe mu matuku a kale, bantu banyi baprofete ba Bena Isalele, bakadi bamba mei abo mu matuku au tô ne ku bidimu bia bungi, babalesha mundualua n ebe bua wewe kubaluisha, anyi
Mukenji wa Mikau Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bikala mukashi wa muntu usesuka, bikaleye umuenzela bibi, bikala mulume mukuabo ulala n andi, bikala bualu ebu busokoma ku mesu kua mulume wandi, kabuyi bumanyibue, bikala mukashi muonyibue ne kakuyi mumonyi wa bualu, kabayi bamukuata hakadiye wenda n andi, ne bikala mukau mumukuate bualu bua mukashi wandi udi muonyibue anyi bikala mukau umukuata bualu bua mukashi wandi udi kayi muonyibue, hashishe mulume alue biandi ne mukashi wandi kudi muakuidi, nealue ne mulambu wandi, tshituha tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula bua orge, kedihu nansha manyi, katekihu nansha musenga wa manananshi, bualu bua eu udi mulambu wa mukau, mulambu wa bukula wa tshivulukidi, bua kuvuluishangana bualu bubi
Bakabandisha mei abo, bakadila kabidi, Ôpa wakatuangana ne mamuen andi mishiku, kadi Luta wakamulamata

Hashikameye ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, yeye neadifundile mukanda wa mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda au udi mu bianza bia bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi; yeye neashale ne mukanda eu, neaubale matuku andi onso; nunku yeye neamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, ne mua kutumikila mei onso ne mikenji yonso bidi bifundamu, bua kubienza; nunku mutshima wandi kaudibandishi ku mutu kua bana babo, nunku yeye kasesuki mu nshila wa mikenji nansha ku tshianza tshia balume nansha ku tshianza tshia bakashi; nunku nebavudishe matuku a bukelenge buandi, ne a bana bandi mu Isalele
Bualu bua wakamana kubuela mu dikisha diandi, yeye muine wakikisha kabidi ku midimu yandi bu muakikisha Nzambi ku midima yandi yeye
Hanuatendelela Nzambi, kanuikadi bu bena lubombo; bobo badi basue kutendelela Nzambi bimana mu nsunagoga ne mu masanga a nshila bua bantu babamone
Mahuahua a buonso buabi binai akadi mabaluluke mulu, mahuahua abidi a tshinga tshifukibue akadi nuluangane ne a tshifukibue tshikuabo, ne mahuahua makuabo abidi akabuikila mubidi watshi
Yesu wakamba ne, Nakunuambila ne, Mmeme; binuikala nunkeba meme, lekelai aba baye; bua kushikishabo dî diandi diakambeye ne, Bawakampa tshiakujimisha umue

Bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, kadi netukusuike bikole, ne tukufile mu bianza biabo, katuena tukushiha nansha

MUTU WA MUKANDA WA KUMPALA I : BULONGOLODI BWA MU KABUJIMA Tshitupa Tshia kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi ne Didikookesha Njila wa kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi Kanungu ka kumpala Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi, anu mu mikalu yadi ya mu dia a kashipunkenza ayi, Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu, mudikadile, mudikookesha, musangisha ne kayi kwabanya, udi utangila majinga a bantu, wa mungalata ne kayi mutwa ku tshia tshisumbu tshia ditabwija nansha tshimwe
Kumpala eku kutshidi bidimu bikuabu bitanu, bidi bantu kabayi mua kudima nansha kunowa
Pa nuenu kumuka, nenupawule bena Ejipitu
Bena Netinima hakadi bashikama mu Ofele ku muaba wa buludiludi ne mushiku wa mbelu wa ku mai ku luseke lua esete ne ku tshibumba tshiakadi tshisompoka
Shaula wakalua ku musoko wa Bena Amaleka, wakabalamina mu tshibanda
Lota wakaya ne Abalama, ne yeye wakadi ne mikoko ne bimuna ne ntenta

Bakalua mu buloba bua Moaba, bakashikamamu
Maweja Nangila kukonka Kayine ne: Muanenu Ebele udi penyi
Kadi ndi ne ditekemena mu Mukelenge kabidi ne meme nkayanyi nendue tshituha tshihi

Nenyemene mu nshila wa mikenji yebe, Yehowa, unyishe nshila wa mikenji yebe mifunda, Umpe lungenyi, bua ndame mikenji yebe; Ungendeshe mu nshila wa mikenji yebe, Inyika mutshima wanyi bua kulondau mei awakummanyisha, Ukudimune mesu anyi bua kâtangidi malu a hatuhu, Ujadikile muntu webe mulayi webe kudiye, Ungumushile tshihendu tshindi ntshina, Mona, nakujinga malu awakunsunguila bua meme kuenza, Yehowa, luse luebe lujalame lufike kundi, Nunku nengikale ne dî dia kukudimuna muntu udi umpenda, Kungumutshidi dî dia bushuwa mukana muanyi kashidi; Nunku nentumikile mikenji yebe matuku onso, Nengendakane mu budishikaminyi, Nengambe kabidi mei ebe awakammanyisha ku mesu kua bakelenge, Nendisankishe mu mikenji yebe, Nengolole bianza bianyi kabidi ku mikenji yebe, Uvuluke mulayi webe kudi mu ntu webe, Ebu mbusambi buanyi mu dikenga dianyi ne, Badi badisue bakutamba kunseka, Nakuvuluka mei ebe majalame a kale, Yehowa, Tshiji tshikole tshiakunkuata bualu bua bantu babi, Mikenji yebe mifunda yakuikala misambu yanyi Ndi nvuluka diha diebe butuku, Yehowa, Ebu mbualu buimpe bundi n abu, Yehowa udi buhianyi buanyi; Nakulomba luse luebe ne mutshima wanyi mujima; Nakelangana meji a bienzedi bianyi, Nakenda lukasa, tshiakajanguluka, Mionshi ya bantu babi yakunjingila, Ndi mbika mundankulu bua kukuela tuasakidila, Ndi mulunda wa bonso badi bakunemeka, Yehowa, buloba budi bûle tente ne luse luebe lujalame; Wewe wakuenzela muntu webe bimpe, Yehowa, Unyishe dijingulula dimpe dia malu ne meji, Diambedi tshiyi muanze kukengeshibua, nkadi mpambuka mu nshila, Wewe udi muimpe, utu wenza bimpe; Badi badisue badi banshiminyina Mitshima yabo yakuvunda ne manyi, Bidi bimpe kundi bua nakukengeshibua, Mikenji ya mukana muebe idi ihita Bianza biebe biakunfuka, biakunvuisha bu mundi; Badi bakunemeka nebantangile, ne basanke, Yehowa, ndi mumanye ne, Kulumbulula kuebe kudi kuakane, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Luse luebe lujalame luikale busambi buanyi, Luse luebe lufike kundi, bua ngikale bianyi ne muoyo; Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakabaluhula mu midima ne mu mufitu mukole, Basakidile Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bualu bua wakutshibula bibi bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, Bantu bahote badi badivuishila dikenga bua diya diabo mu nshila wa ditombokela diabo, Mitshima yabo idi ikenuka mishindu ya bia kudia yonso; Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakabatumina dî diandi, wakashikisha masama abo, Basakidile Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bafile milambu kudiye ya kumusakidila n ai, Bakahueka ku mai manene mu matu, bakamona biabo bienzedi bia Yehowa, Bualu bua wakela mukenji, wakahehesha tshihehele tshiakadi bu tshihuhu, Bakabanda mulu, bakahueka kabidi muinshi mu mai a ndondo, Bakatenkakana eku ne eku, bakadi balendukalenduka bu muntu mukuatshike maluvu, Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakaholesha tshihuhu bua tshituye biatshi, Ka bobo bakasanka bualu bua mavuala au akabatama, Basakidile biabo Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bamunemeshe mu disangisha dia bantu, Udi ukudimuna misulu bua kuluayi tshihela tshia lusenga, Udi ukudimuna buloba bufuke bua kuluabu tshihela tshia luehu, Udi ukudimuna tshihela tshia lusenga bua kuluatshi dishiba dia mai, Mu miaba yaya udi ushikamisha badi ne nzala, Badi bakuna maminu mu madimi, badi batentula mionshi ya tumuma mu manga madimi, Udi ubavudishila disanka, badi bavulangana ba bungi; Mitshi ai neyikale mu nkanu ya mushete, kayumuki nansha

Muan anyi, wikale ne meji, usankishe mutshima wanyi, Muntu mudimuke udi utangila dikenga diamba kumukuata, udi usokoma; Angata tshivualu tshia muntu udi mueyeke muenyi tshieya; ukuate udi mueyeke ba tshisamba tshia bende Biavudishila muntu muena mutumba n andi disanka ne dî dikole ne dinda dionso, Kumatamata kua mai dituku dia nvula wa mudimbi Udi ukeba kumukanda udi bu udi ukanda luhehele, Bu mudi tshiamu tshisakisha tshinga tshiamu, Muntu udi ulama mutshi wa nfigi neadie mamuma au, Bu mudi mpala umueneka mu mai, Muaba wa Bafue ne wa Kubutuka Luesu ludiku lua kulengesha tshiamu tshia argent, Biwatua muhote ne muinshi mu tshinu Umanye bimpe mudi mushindu wa bisumbu bia mikoko yebe, Bualu bua biuma kabienaku tshiendelele; Hatahabo bisoso bia kudisha bana ba mikoko nebikaleku bua bivualu biebe, Newikale ne mabele a mbushi makumbane bua bia kudia biebe, Nsumuinu Bantu babi badi banyema kakuyi muntu udi ubihata, Bua ditomboka dia ba ha buloba bakokeshi babu badi ba bungi; Muntu muhele udi ukengesha bahele Badi balekela kulonda diyisha dia mikenji badi batumbisha bantu babi, Bantu babi kabena bajingulula kulumbulula kuakane, Muntu muhele udi wenda mu buakane bua mutshima udi utamba Udi utumikila diyisha dia mikenji udi muana mulume udi ne meji, Udi utudisha biuma biandi ku kasombela ne ku makasa Udi umusha matshu andi ku diyisha dia mikenji, Udi uhambuisha bantu bakane bua bobo bende mu nshila mubi Muntu mubanji udi wela meji ne, Ndi ne meji, Hatumba bantu bakane, butumbi bunene budiku; Udi usokoka matomboka andi kena wikala ne diakalengele, Disanka didi kudi muntu udi utshina malu mabi misangu yonso, Bu nyama wa ntambue udi udila, anyi bu nkashama udi ukeba nyama ya kudia, Mukokeshi udi kayi ne lungenyi udi mukengeshi mukole kabidi; Muntu udibo bahisha bualu bua mashi a munga muntu adi ham bidi handi aye mu dijimba; Muntu udi wenda mu buakane neahandishibue, Udi udima budimi buandi neikale ne bia kudia bia bungi, Muntu udi mua kueyemenyibua neavudishibue ne masanka a bungi, Kulesha kansungusungu kakuena kuimpe; Muena lukuka udi wenda lukasa bua kuheta biuma, Udi ubela muntu neahete diakalengele dihite Udi wiba bintu bia tatu andi anyi bia mamu andi, Udi ne mutshima wa lukuka udi usonsola matandu, Udi weyemena mutshima wandi udi muhote, Udi uha bahele bintu kena ukengela tshintu, Habuela bantu babi mu bukokeshi, banga bantu badi basokoma; Nsumuinu Muntu udi mubedibue misangu ya bungi, kadi udi wela mpala mulu, Hikala bantu bakane ne bukokeshi, bantu badi basanka; Muntu udi unanga meji udi usankisha tatu andi, Mukelenge udi ujadika buloba buandi ku kulumbulula kuakane, Udi ubomba muena mutumba n andi Mu ditomboka dia muntu mubi mudi buteyi, Muntu muakane udi mumanye ne, Bahele badi bakengela kulumbulula kuakane, Babuidi badi batemesha kahia mu musoko, Biatandangana muena meji ne muhote mu tshilumbu, Badi bakeba kumatshisha mashi badi bakina muntu muakane; Muhote udi uhatula tshiji tshionso tshidiye n atshi, Biunvua mukokeshi mei a mashimi, Muhele ne mukengeshi badi basangile hamue; Bialumbuluisha mukelenge bahele ne lulamatu lua bushuwa, Lukodi ne kubela bidi biyisha meji, Hikala bantu babi mu bukokeshi, ditomboka didi didiunda; Nuenze midimu yenu matuku asambombu

Kuinyikaye tshibuashibuashi ne: Ndiulu
Ndi mukelenge muedibue manyi ha mutu kadi bualu ebu budi buntekesha lelu; bantu aba, bana ba Seluya, badi bampite bukole; Yehowa afute muenji wa malu mabi bu mudi bubi buandi
Bena Izrayele bavua bafikisha Maweja Nangila munda, benza malu mabi, batendelela mvidie ya bisamba bikuabu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuebeja mukaji ne: Tshiwenzedi nanku ntshinyi
Nyunyu ei idi mibi kunudi, kanudi nyunyu ei nyunyu wa mukanku ne nyunyu wa gypaête ne nyunyu wa orfraie, ne nyunyu wa milan mufike ne wa milan mukunze ne mushindu wonso wa tshikololo ne nyunyu wa autriche ne nyunyu wa chat huant ne nyunyu wa mouette ne wa nkumbikumbi ne nyunyu wa tshihungulu ne nyunyu wa choutte ne nyunyu wa ibis, ne nyunyu wa pélican ne nyunyu mutoke utu wadia bintu bibole ne nyunyu wa cormoran ne nyunyu wa cigogne ne nyunyu wa ya héron ne nyunyu wa huppe ne nyunyu wa mudima
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke milau ei yonso ham bidi ha bena lukuna ne badi n enu tshiji, bakadi banukengesha
Ndi nnutshihisha, nuenu bana bakashi ba mu Yelushalema, ne, Kanusonsolodi, kanubishi wanyi munanga anu hasueye
Nebabueje milonda ku tshilambuilu bua kutshiambuilaku
Gala wakaya ku mpala kua bena Shekeme, wakaluangana ne Abimeleke
Kanungu ka Kakweena muntu udi mwa kudibweelela mu nzubu mwa muntu to
Tito Ubavuluishe bua kukokelabo banfumu ne bakokeshi, batumikile dî diabo, bikale balongolodibue bua mudimu muimpe wonso; kabakudi mei mabi bua muntu; kabikadi ne kutandangana: bikale ne buhole, baleshe bantu bonso kalolo konso
Bana betu, tangilai dibikidibua dienu ne, Kakuena ba bungi babikidibue badi bena meshi mu buntu buabo, kakuena ba bungi badi bakole, kakuena ba bungi badi baledibue bena butumbi
Yeye wakatshina ne, Yeye neafue bu muakafua bana babo
Eku kudi dijingulula didi ne meshi: mitu muanda mutekete idi mikuna minene muanda mutekete, hadi mukashi ushikama; ne bakelenge muanda mutekete badiku; batanu bakumana kuhona, umue udiku, ne mukuabo kena muanze kulua; ne halueye, budiye n abu mbua kushala tshituha tshihi
Yoshua wakambila Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe ne, Nuvuluke dî diakanuambila Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuha dikisha, neanuhe buloba ebu
Bana aba ke ndelanganyi ya Elifaze, muanabute wa Esawu, uvuaye mulele ne mukajende Ada
